translated: O sons of the Victorious Ones, here the bodhisattvas, in order to benefit sentient beings, give away their bodies to the gods of the Four Great Kings, the gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three, the Yāma gods, the Joyous gods, the gods who delight in creation, the gods who control the enjoyments created by others, the Brahmakāyika gods, the Brahmapurohita gods,

original: tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med snang ba dang / shin tu snang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang /
analyzed: tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med snang ba dang / shin tu snang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang /
translated: the Brahmakāyika, Brahmapurohita, Brahmapārṣadya, Mahābrahma, Ābhāsvara, Parīttābha, Apramāṇābha, Ābhāsvara, Śubha, Parīttaśubha, Apramāṇaśubha,

original: dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams nas nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa dang /
analyzed: dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams nas nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa dang /
translated: Śubhakṛtsna, Bṛhatphala, Avṛha, Atapa, Sudarśana, and Akaniṣṭha gods, as well as the perfection of the śrāvakas

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa dag kyang nyan te /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa dag kyang nyan te /
translated: and the perfection of the pratyekabuddhas.

original: des de dag thos nas kyang rmongs par mi 'gyur /🔽shin tu rmongs par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: des de dag thos nas kyang rmongs par mi 'gyur / shin tu rmongs par mi 'gyur /
translated: Having heard them, he is not confused,🔽he is not utterly confused,

original: rab tu rmongs par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: rab tu rmongs par mi 'gyur /
translated: he is not completely confused.

original: zhum par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: zhum par mi 'gyur /
translated: He is not discouraged,

original: kun nas zhum par mi 'gyur; rnam par zhum par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: kun nas zhum par mi 'gyur; rnam par zhum par mi 'gyur /
translated: he is not utterly discouraged, he is not completely discouraged.

original: shin tu zhum par mi 'gyur /🔽dma' bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: shin tu zhum par mi 'gyur / dma' bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: He does not become very timid,

original: 'di ltar de ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar de ni /
translated: nor does he become low-spirited.

original: shes pas 'du byed du gtogs pa thams cad rmi lam lta bur @123a *//🔽mngon du byed do //🔽de 'di snyam du gang sbyin par bya ba 'di ni /
analyzed: shes pas 'du byed du gtogs pa thams cad rmi lam lta bur @123a *// mngon du byed do // de 'di snyam du gang sbyin par bya ba 'di ni /
translated: Because he has understood that all conditioned things are like a dream.🔽He does not become attached to the idea that he is giving a gift.

original: su'i yang ma yin no //
analyzed: su'i yang ma yin no //
translated: He thinks, “This gift is not anyone’s at all.”

original: snyam ste / ngan song gi lam nye bar gnas pa bzlog par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir chos ston kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lam mngon du gyur pa'i phyir de la sems rgyu ba med de /
analyzed: snyam ste / ngan song gi lam nye bar gnas pa bzlog par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir chos ston kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lam mngon du gyur pa'i phyir de la sems rgyu ba med de /
translated: He teaches the Dharma in order to turn away from the paths to the lower realms and in order to accomplish all the qualities of a Buddha. But because the bodhisattva path is manifest, his mind does not move toward those.

original: 'di ni / da ltar byung ba gtong ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / da ltar byung ba gtong ba zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called “giving what is present.”

original: de la byang chub sems dpa'i shin tu gtong ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa'i shin tu gtong ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is a bodhisattva’s giving of what is difficult to give?

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can mig dang mi ldan pa dang / rna ba dang mi ldan pa dang / sna dang mi ldan pa dang / lce dang mi ldan pa dang / lus dang mi ldan pa grangs med pa zhig gis 'di skad du bdag cag la ci med pa de khyod kyis byin la /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can mig dang mi ldan pa dang / rna ba dang mi ldan pa dang / sna dang mi ldan pa dang / lce dang mi ldan pa dang / lus dang mi ldan pa grangs med pa zhig gis 'di skad du bdag cag la ci med pa de khyod kyis byin la /
translated: “Give me what I do not have.

original: nged mi ldan pa med par gyis shig /
analyzed: nged mi ldan pa med par gyis shig /
translated: Make me not lacking.

original: khyod ni / bskal pa grangs med par mi ldan par 'dug cig /
analyzed: khyod ni / bskal pa grangs med par mi ldan par 'dug cig /
translated: You have been lacking for countless eons.

original: ces zer na /🔽byang chub sems dpa' ni /
analyzed: ces zer na / byang chub sems dpa' ni /
translated: If someone were to say this,🔽the bodhisattva would reply,🔽“

original: de thos ma thag tu sems can de dag mi ldan pa med par sgrub ste /
analyzed: de thos ma thag tu sems can de dag mi ldan pa med par sgrub ste /
translated: When the bodhisattva hears this, he immediately makes those beings not lacking.

original: bskal pa grangs med par dbang po dang mi ldan pa de yang nyams su len to //
analyzed: bskal pa grangs med par dbang po dang mi ldan pa de yang nyams su len to //
translated: He practices that lack of faculties for countless eons.

original: de ma'i lto na 'dug pa'i tshe ji lta bur spyod pa dang / mer mer por 'dug pa ji lta bu yin pa dang / rdos par gyur pa ji lta bu yin pa dang / mkhregs par gyur pa ji lta bu yin pa dang / dbang po grub pa ji lta bu yin pa dang /
analyzed: de ma'i lto na 'dug pa'i tshe ji lta bur spyod pa dang / mer mer por 'dug pa ji lta bu yin pa dang / rdos par gyur pa ji lta bu yin pa dang / mkhregs par gyur pa ji lta bu yin pa dang / dbang po grub pa ji lta bu yin pa dang /
translated: What is it like to have the faculties formed?🔽What is it like to be born?🔽What is it like to be old?🔽What is it like to be sick?🔽What is it like to die?

original: skyes pa ji lta bu yin pa dang / @123b rga ba ji lta bu yin pa dang / na ba ji lta bu yin pa dang / shi ba ji lta bu yin pa dang / lus kyi rang bzhin thog ma dang / bar ma dang /🔽tha ma ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par rab tu shes so //
analyzed: skyes pa ji lta bu yin pa dang / @123b rga ba ji lta bu yin pa dang / na ba ji lta bu yin pa dang / shi ba ji lta bu yin pa dang / lus kyi rang bzhin thog ma dang / bar ma dang / tha ma ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par rab tu shes so //
translated: What is the nature of the body from beginning to end?

original: ngom du mi rung ba dang / ngo tsha skye ba /
analyzed: ngom du mi rung ba dang / ngo tsha skye ba /
translated: It is not fit to be shown. It is shameful.

original: 'phags pa ma yin pa /🔽dri mi zhim pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa ma yin pa / dri mi zhim pa /
translated: It is not noble.🔽It is foul-smelling.

original: rjen pa'i dri can /
analyzed: rjen pa'i dri can /
translated: It has the smell of raw flesh.

original: ror 'gyur ba /
analyzed: ror 'gyur ba /
translated: It becomes a corpse.

original: rus pa bsags pa /
analyzed: rus pa bsags pa /
translated: It is a collection of bones.

original: sha dang khrag gis g-yogs pa /
analyzed: sha dang khrag gis g-yogs pa /
translated: It is covered with flesh and blood.

original: rma dgu nas rtag tu zag pa'o //
analyzed: rma dgu nas rtag tu zag pa'o //
translated: It is always oozing from nine wounds.

original: zhes nas de ni /
analyzed: zhes nas de ni /
translated: And so on.

original: sems bskyed pa gcig tsam gyis kyang de don du gnyer bar mi sems te /
analyzed: sems bskyed pa gcig tsam gyis kyang de don du gnyer bar mi sems te /
translated: He does not think of striving for that goal even with a single thought of enlightenment.

original: sems bskyed pa gcig gis kyang chags pa mi skyed do //
analyzed: sems bskyed pa gcig gis kyang chags pa mi skyed do //
translated: He does not arouse desire even with a single thought of enlightenment.

original: de shin tu gtong ba des 'dzin pa med pa'i yid dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: de shin tu gtong ba des 'dzin pa med pa'i yid dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: He has a mind free from grasping, because of his great giving.

original: lus 'di ni /
analyzed: lus 'di ni /
translated: This body

original: de ltar snying po med pa yin na /
analyzed: de ltar snying po med pa yin na /
translated: is like that, without any essence.

original: bdag gis lus 'di snying po med par mngon par mthong bzhin du lus la chags par ji ltar bya /
analyzed: bdag gis lus 'di snying po med par mngon par mthong bzhin du lus la chags par ji ltar bya /
translated: How can I, seeing this body as essenceless, become attached to the body?

original: sems can 'di dag gi bsam pa de bzhin yongs su tshim par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can 'di dag gi bsam pa de bzhin yongs su tshim par bya'o //
translated: I will satisfy the wishes of these sentient beings in the same way.

original: lus snying po med pa 'dis 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: lus snying po med pa 'dis 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: With this essenceless body, I will satisfy the wishes of all beings.

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyis kyang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyis kyang shes par bya'o //
translated: All beings will know

original: ye shes kyi tshogs gang yang rung ba la yang mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi tshogs gang yang rung ba la yang mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gzhag par bya'o //
translated: that I will establish them in the accumulation of wisdom, in such a way that they will not be attached to any accumulation of wisdom.

original: zhes nas lus kyi 'du shes kyang med /
analyzed: zhes nas lus kyi 'du shes kyang med /
translated: Then, he has no notion of a body,

original: sems kyi 'du shes kyang med de /
analyzed: sems kyi 'du shes kyang med de /
translated: and no notion of a mind.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: O children of the Victorious Ones,

original: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa'i gtong ba'i gtor te /
analyzed: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa'i gtong ba'i gtor te /
translated: this is the bodhisattvas’ offering of generosity,🔽the sixth one.

original: drug pa'o // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /🔽de la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi @124a *//
analyzed: drug pa'o // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag / de la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi @124a *//
translated: O children of the Victorious Ones,

original: gter gang zhe na /
analyzed: gter gang zhe na /
translated: what is the bodhisattvas’ treasure of wisdom?

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gzugs rab tu shes so //🔽gzugs kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so //
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gzugs rab tu shes so // gzugs kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so //
translated: Here, the bodhisattvas know form.🔽They know the origin of form.

original: gzugs kyi 'gog pa rab tu shes so //
analyzed: gzugs kyi 'gog pa rab tu shes so //
translated: They know the cessation of form.

original: gzugs 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: gzugs 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: They know the path that leads to the cessation of form just as it is.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: Likewise, they know feelings, perceptions, formations, and consciousnesses just as they are.

original: rnam par shes pa'i kun 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i kun 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: They know the origin of consciousness just as it is.

original: rnam par shes pa 'gog pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so; ;rnam par shes pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa 'gog pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so; ;rnam par shes pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the cessation of consciousness as it really is. He knows the path leading to the cessation of consciousness as it really is.

original: ma rig pa rab tu shes so //
analyzed: ma rig pa rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows ignorance.

original: ma rig pa'i kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so //🔽ma rig pa 'gog pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so // ma rig pa 'gog pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the arising of ignorance.🔽He knows the cessation of ignorance.

original: ma rig pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: ma rig pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the path leading to the cessation of ignorance as it really is.

original: sred pa rab tu shes so //🔽sred pa kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so //
analyzed: sred pa rab tu shes so // sred pa kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows craving.🔽He knows the arising of craving.

original: sred pa 'gog pa rab tu shes so //
analyzed: sred pa 'gog pa rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the cessation of craving.

original: sred pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: sred pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the path leading to the cessation of craving as it really is.

original: nyan thos rab tu shes so /🔽nyan thos kyi chos rab tu shes so //
analyzed: nyan thos rab tu shes so / nyan thos kyi chos rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the śrāvakas.🔽He knows the Dharma of the śrāvakas.

original: nyan thos kyi kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the arising of the śrāvaka Dharma.

original: nyan thos kyi mya ngan las 'da' ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi mya ngan las 'da' ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the nirvāṇa of the śrāvakas just as it is.

original: rang sangs @124b rgyas rab tu shes so //🔽rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu shes so //
analyzed: rang sangs @124b rgyas rab tu shes so // rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the pratyekabuddhas.🔽He knows the dharmas of the pratyekabuddhas.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the origin of the pratyekabuddhas.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the nirvāṇa of the pratyekabuddhas just as it is.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rab tu shes so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i chos rab tu shes so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i chos rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the dharmas of the bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i kun 'byung ba rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the origin of the bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows the nirvāṇa of the bodhisattvas just as it is.

original: ji ltar shes she na /
analyzed: ji ltar shes she na /
translated: How does he know?

original: las dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa dang / bya ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa dang / gso ba dang / gsog dang / snying po med pa dang / bdag med par rab tu shes te /
analyzed: las dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa dang / bya ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa dang / gso ba dang / gsog dang / snying po med pa dang / bdag med par rab tu shes te /
translated: He knows that actions and the ripening of actions are fabricated, are compounded, are perishable, are not lasting, are not the self, and are devoid of self.

original: chos gang yang snying po can du shes pa med do //
analyzed: chos gang yang snying po can du shes pa med do //
translated: He does not know any dharma that is not perishable.

original: chos gang la'ang rang bzhin du 'dogs pa med de; ngo bo nyid kyi mthas gtugs par thams cad rab tu shes so //
analyzed: chos gang la'ang rang bzhin du 'dogs pa med de; ngo bo nyid kyi mthas gtugs par thams cad rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows that all dharmas are without self, without a living being, without a soul, without a person, without an owner, and without a experiencer.

original: sems can rnams la yang de bzhin nyid kyi don du chos ston te /
analyzed: sems can rnams la yang de bzhin nyid kyi don du chos ston te /
translated: He teaches the Dharma to beings in order to show them suchness.

original: de ci ston ce na /
analyzed: de ci ston ce na /
translated: What does he teach?

original: 'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos ston te /
analyzed: 'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos ston te /
translated: He teaches the Dharma in order to show non-destruction.

original: gang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: gang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir zhe na /
translated: What is non-destruction?

original: gzugs 'jig pa med pa'i phyir /🔽tshor ba 'jig pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzugs 'jig pa med pa'i phyir / tshor ba 'jig pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: He teaches the Dharma in order to show the non-destruction of form.🔽He teaches the Dharma in order to show the non-destruction of feeling,

original: 'du shes 'jig pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'du shes 'jig pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to show the non-destruction of perception,

original: 'du byed 'jig pa med pa'i phyir /🔽rnam par shes pa 'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos ston to //
analyzed: 'du byed 'jig pa med pa'i phyir / rnam par shes pa 'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos ston to //
translated: in order to show the non-destruction of volitional factors,🔽and in order to show the non-destruction of consciousness.

original: ma rig pa 'jig pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ma rig pa 'jig pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: He teaches the Dharma in order to show the non-destruction of ignorance.

original: nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub @125a *//
analyzed: nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub @125a *//
translated: the Dharma of the śrāvakas, the Dharma of the pratyekabuddhas, and the Dharma of the bodhisattvas.

original: sems dpa'i chos 'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos ston to //
analyzed: sems dpa'i chos 'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos ston to //
translated: He teaches the Dharma because the Dharma of the śrāvakas, the Dharma of the pratyekabuddhas, and the Dharma of the bodhisattvas are indestructible.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: chos ni / ma skyes pa /
analyzed: chos ni / ma skyes pa /
translated: The Dharma is unborn,

original: 'dus ma byas pa /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas pa /
translated: uncompounded,

original: byed pa po med pa /
analyzed: byed pa po med pa /
translated: without an agent,

original: rtsod pa med pa /
analyzed: rtsod pa med pa /
translated: without conflict,

original: gnas pa med pa /🔽ma skyes pa /
analyzed: gnas pa med pa / ma skyes pa /
translated: without location,🔽unborn,

original: mi 'byung ba /🔽ma blangs pa /
analyzed: mi 'byung ba / ma blangs pa /
translated: non-arisen,🔽unaccepted,

original: nye bar ma blangs pa /
analyzed: nye bar ma blangs pa /
translated: unappropriated,

original: byed pa med pa ste /
analyzed: byed pa med pa ste /
translated: and inactive.

original: de shes rab kyi gter de lta bu dang ldan pas las gron chung ngus chos thams cad la mkhas pa /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi gter de lta bu dang ldan pas las gron chung ngus chos thams cad la mkhas pa /
translated: Endowed with such a treasure of wisdom, with little effort he becomes skilled in all dharmas,

original: gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: and he knows reality just as it is, without relying on others.

original: shes rab kyi gter de yang mi zad pa yin te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi gter de yang mi zad pa yin te /
translated: That treasure of wisdom is inexhaustible.

original: de yang shin tu bstan pa bcus mi zad pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang shin tu bstan pa bcus mi zad pa yin no //
translated: And it is inexhaustible through ten perfect teachings.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?

original: thos pa la mkhas pas mi zad do //
analyzed: thos pa la mkhas pas mi zad do //
translated: It is inexhaustible through skill in hearing.

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen pas mi zad do //
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen pas mi zad do //
translated: It is inexhaustible through attending to spiritual friends.

original: tshig rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pas mi zad do //
analyzed: tshig rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pas mi zad do //
translated: It is inexhaustible because of skill in the analysis of words.

original: chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa mngon par sgrub pas mi zad do //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa mngon par sgrub pas mi zad do //
translated: It is inexhaustible because of the accomplishment of entering into the realm of reality.

original: rgyan gcig pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su zhugs pas mi zad do //
analyzed: rgyan gcig pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su zhugs pas mi zad do //

analyzed: gser gyi dril bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu 'khrol ba'i sgra yid du 'ong bar 'byung ba /
translated: The sound of ten trillion golden bells ringing out in a pleasant way arose.

analyzed: dpal gyi be'u bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i phreng ba rab tu dbyangs pas yongs su dag pa /
translated: It was completely pure, with the sound of the garlands of ten trillion svastikas.

analyzed: rin po che'i bkra shis bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i mtshan bzang po byung ba /

analyzed: gser gyi dam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i gser gyi lcag bod kyis kun tu bltas pa /
translated: It was completely surrounded by ten trillion golden fences.

original: rin po che'i gdugs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rin po che thams cad kyi yu bas bzung ba /
analyzed: rin po che'i gdugs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rin po che thams cad kyi yu bas bzung ba /
translated: There were ten trillion parasols of precious materials, each with a handle of all kinds of precious substances.

analyzed: rin po che'i rgyan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rin po che'i rgyan gyi dra ba @135b thams cad du rnam par bres pa /
translated: There were ten trillion precious ornaments, a net of precious ornaments covering everywhere.

original: rin po che'i 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu 'od zer sna tshogs su rab tu 'phro ba /🔽snang ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun tu snang bar byed pa /
analyzed: rin po che'i 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu 'od zer sna tshogs su rab tu 'phro ba / snang ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun tu snang bar byed pa /
translated: There were ten trillion light rays of precious substances, various light rays shining forth.🔽There were ten trillion lights, illuminating everywhere.

original: 'od bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu 'tsher ba /
analyzed: 'od bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu 'tsher ba /
translated: There were ten trillion radiances, shining brightly.

analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus gzugs rab tu mdzes shing lus shin tu 'phags pa /

analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog du mar bsgrubs pa /

original: spos kyi 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab rib med par snang ba /
analyzed: spos kyi 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab rib med par snang ba /
translated: There were ten trillion light rays of incense, shining without obscurity.

original: lha rdzas kyi padmo'i dam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rab tu bsgrubs shing snying po shin tu 'phags pa /
analyzed: lha rdzas kyi padmo'i dam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rab tu bsgrubs shing snying po shin tu 'phags pa /

original: rin po che'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus snying po kun nas yog par byas pa /
analyzed: rin po che'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus snying po kun nas yog par byas pa /

analyzed: me tog gi dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun nas rgyas par bkram pa /

analyzed: spos kyi dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i dri sna tshogs kyis kun nas yog pa / lha rdzas kyi gdan rin po che bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mdzes par bting ba /
translated: It was covered with the various fragrances of ten trillion nets of incense.🔽It was beautified with ten trillion precious divine seats.

original: lha rdzas kyi gos rin po che bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mdzes par bkram pa /🔽lha rdzas kyi gos kha dog sngon po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu brgyan par bting ba /
analyzed: lha rdzas kyi gos rin po che bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mdzes par bkram pa / lha rdzas kyi gos kha dog sngon po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu brgyan par bting ba /
translated: It was spread with ten trillion precious divine cloths.🔽It was spread with ten trillion divine blue cloths.

original: lha rdzas kyi gos kha dog ser bo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rgyan chen por bting ba /
analyzed: lha rdzas kyi gos kha dog ser bo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rgyan chen por bting ba /
translated: It was spread with ten trillion divine yellow cloths.

analyzed: lha rdzas kyi gos kha dog dmar po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu lha'i dga' bar bting ba / lha rdzas kyi gos kha dog @136a *// sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu gos kyi rgyan du bting ba /

analyzed: lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi gos rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kha dog legs par bting ba /

analyzed: spos sna tshogs kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i gos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu gos bzang por bting ba /

original: rin po che rmad du byung ba thams cad kyi gos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong ba'i rgyan du bting ba /
analyzed: rin po che rmad du byung ba thams cad kyi gos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong ba'i rgyan du bting ba /

analyzed: gos dkar po sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus bla gab tu bkab pa /

original: lha rdzas kyi dril bu'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong ba'i sgra phyung ba /
analyzed: lha rdzas kyi dril bu'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong ba'i sgra phyung ba /

analyzed: gser gyi dra ba'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu sgra shin tu 'byin cing yongs su bzung ba /

original: lha rdzas kyi snam bu rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rgyal mtshan gyi dra ba'i rgyan du brgyan pa /
analyzed: lha rdzas kyi snam bu rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rgyal mtshan gyi dra ba'i rgyan du brgyan pa /
translated: There were ten trillion banners of divine cloth and jewels that were arrayed as ornaments of banner nets.

analyzed: spos kyi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus spos kyi dra ba thams cad kyi rgyan rnam par dag pa /

analyzed: lha rdzas kyi me tog gi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu me tog thams cad kyi char du 'bab pa /

analyzed: lha rdzas kyi gos kyi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus gos thams cad du bskyod pa /
translated: There were ten trillion banners of divine cloth that were all cloths.

translated: ten trillion banners of divine jewels, ten trillion banners of divine ornaments,🔽ten trillion banners of divine garlands,🔽ten trillion banners of divine parasols,

analyzed: lha rdzas kyi rnga bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rnga chen po'i sgra shin tu phyung ba /

analyzed: lha rdzas kyi pi wang bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong zhing 'brel ba'i sgra phyung ba / lha rdzas kyi kha sbyar bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dbyangs chen por sgra bsgrags pa /

analyzed: lha rdzas kyi sil snyan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu glu dang rol mor sbyar ba dang ldan pa /

analyzed: lha rdzas kyi rol mo dbyangs kyi dam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i sgra yid du 'ong bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mngon par grags par byas pa /

analyzed: sprul pa'i rol mo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sgra brnyan gyi tshogs lta bur shes par byas pa /
translated: Ten trillion emanated musical instruments were played, and all world systems were understood to be like an assembly of echoes.

original: lha rdzas kyi rnga bo che bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu brdungs pa'i sgra phyung ba /
analyzed: lha rdzas kyi rnga bo che bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu brdungs pa'i sgra phyung ba /

analyzed: yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lha rdzas kyi rol mo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rol mo'i sgra yid du 'ong ba dang glu'i dbyangs @137a *// snyan pa phyung ba /
translated: ten trillion divine musical instruments of the nature of mind, producing beautiful sounds and melodious songs,

analyzed: lha rdzas kyi rol mor gtogs pa sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid dga' ba dang zhi ba'i sgra phyung ba /

analyzed: tshig gi rim pa yid du 'ong ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus bstod cing mchod pa /
translated: ten trillion beautiful sequences of words, praising and making offerings,

original: bstod pa rgya chen po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dga' bar bstod cing mchod pa /
analyzed: bstod pa rgya chen po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dga' bar bstod cing mchod pa /
translated: ten trillion vast praises, praising and making offerings with joy,

original: zab mor bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu bsgoms shing bstod pa /
analyzed: zab mor bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu bsgoms shing bstod pa /
translated: ten trillion profound praises, praising with deep meditation,

analyzed: bstod pa sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus las thams cad kyi rnam par smin pa las yongs su byung bar bstod pa /
translated: ten trillion various praises, praising the ripening of all actions.

original: phra bar bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstod pa /
analyzed: phra bar bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstod pa /
translated: with ten trillion subtle praises, praising in accordance with reality;

original: sngon gyi spyod pas bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par brjod de 'das pas bstod pa /
analyzed: sngon gyi spyod pas bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par brjod de 'das pas bstod pa /
translated: with ten trillion praises of past conduct, praising through expression;

original: dge ba'i bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus brtan cing bstod pa /
analyzed: dge ba'i bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus brtan cing bstod pa /
translated: with ten trillion virtuous praises, praising with firmness;

analyzed: sngon gyi sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur ba'i bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rnam par dag par bstod pa /
translated: with ten trillion praises of serving past buddhas, praising with purity;

original: chos kyi sgo'i bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par byung bar bstod cing 'jigs pa med par bstod pa /
analyzed: chos kyi sgo'i bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par byung bar bstod cing 'jigs pa med par bstod pa /
translated: with ten trillion praises of the Dharma gateway, praising with emergence and fearlessness;

original: bstod pa rnam pa tha dad pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mi zad par brjod cing bsngags te bstod pa /
analyzed: bstod pa rnam pa tha dad pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mi zad par brjod cing bsngags te bstod pa /
translated: with ten trillion different kinds of praises, praising all bodhisattvas with inexhaustible expression, praise, and eulogy.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad glur @137b brjod cing sbyar ba /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad glur @137b brjod cing sbyar ba /
translated: There were ten trillion songs of the Bodhisattvabhumi, which were sung and composed about all the bodhisattva levels.

original: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus thogs pa med par bstod pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus thogs pa med par bstod pa /
translated: There were ten trillion unobstructed praises of the qualities of the buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas mthong ba'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu glu'i dbyangs su blangs pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas mthong ba'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu glu'i dbyangs su blangs pa /
translated: There were ten trillion songs of seeing the buddhas, which were sung as melodies.

original: chos zab mo'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus thogs pa med par chos kyi snang ba thams cad glu blangs te sbyar ba /
analyzed: chos zab mo'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus thogs pa med par chos kyi snang ba thams cad glu blangs te sbyar ba /
translated: There were ten trillion unobstructed songs of the profound Dharma, which were sung and composed as songs of all the appearances of the Dharma.

original: dbyangs rgya chen po'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong ba'i sgrar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bsgrags pa /
analyzed: dbyangs rgya chen po'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong ba'i sgrar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bsgrags pa /
translated: There were ten trillion songs of vast melodies, which were proclaimed as beautiful sounds in all the buddha realms.

original: sems dang bsam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu thogs pa med par glur blangs shing rna ba dang bar byas pa /
analyzed: sems dang bsam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu thogs pa med par glur blangs shing rna ba dang bar byas pa /
translated: There were ten trillion songs of unobstructed minds and thoughts, which were sung and made to be heard.

original: khams gsum du gtogs pa'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rnam par bstan pa /
analyzed: khams gsum du gtogs pa'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rnam par bstan pa /
translated: There were ten trillion songs from the three realms that revealed the nature of all phenomena.

original: dga' bar byed pa'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu thogs pa med pas dad pa dang rim gro rab tu bskyed pa /
analyzed: dga' bar byed pa'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu thogs pa med pas dad pa dang rim gro rab tu bskyed pa /
translated: There were ten trillion songs that delighted and inspired, which were sung with devotion and respect without impediment.

original: sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul gyi glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus chos kyi don thams cad gsal bar brjod cing sgra phyung ba /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul gyi glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus chos kyi don thams cad gsal bar brjod cing sgra phyung ba /
translated: There were ten trillion songs of the domain of the buddhas that expressed and proclaimed the meaning of all the Dharma.

original: gzungs kyi glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi ldem po dag rab tu rtogs par rnam par ston pa /
analyzed: gzungs kyi glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi ldem po dag rab tu rtogs par rnam par ston pa /
translated: There were ten trillion songs of dhāraṇī that revealed the skill in the analysis of the words of all the Dharma and the understanding of the indirect teachings of all the tathāgatas.

original: chos thams cad kyi glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus chos thams cad kyi glu dang / rol mo dang / sil snyan gyi sgra phyung ba dang ldan pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus chos thams cad kyi glu dang / rol mo dang / sil snyan gyi sgra phyung ba dang ldan pa /
translated: There were ten trillion songs of all the Dharma that were accompanied by the sounds of all the songs, music, and cymbals of the Dharma.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa bye @138a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa bye @138a *//
translated: ten trillion bodhisattvas who had newly generated the mind of awakening,

analyzed: ba brgya stong phrag bcu la thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems kyi stobs dang shugs mthong ma thag tu skye bar byed pa /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i sems dga' zhing mos par byed pa /
translated: ten trillion bodhisattvas who were beginners and who were delighted and inspired,

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor la spyod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i mos pa rnam par sbyong ba; byang chub sems dpa' cher skyes pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i theg pa chen po brtsams pa rgya cher byed pa /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sbyor ba dang ldan pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i theg pa chen po brtsams pa yongs su rgyas par byed pa /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dang ldan pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad shin tu sbyong ba /
translated: There were ten trillion bodhisattvas who had the intention to purify all bodhisattva conduct.

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nur gyur pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar byed pa /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug par byed pa /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong @138b phrag bcu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gzhal du med pa ston pa /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i shugs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rnam par 'phel bar byed pa /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i blo gros bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu yangs pa'i blo tshad med par ston pa /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rtsa ba brtan par byed pa /

analyzed: stong phrag bcu gtong ba thams cad sbyin pas rnam par sbyong ba /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu tshad med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par sgrub pa /
translated: It is the accomplishment of the perfection of immeasurable ethics, with ten trillion bodhisattva ethics.

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu sems 'khrug pa med pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la bzod par 'jug pa /
translated: It is the engagement in the acceptance of all the qualities of the Buddha, with ten trillion bodhisattva acceptances, with an undisturbed mind.

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mtha' yas pa'i brtson 'grus su 'byung bar byed pa /
translated: It is the arising of infinite diligence, with ten trillion bodhisattva exertions.

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu tshad med pa'i bsam gtan rtogs pa'i snang bar byed pa /
translated: It is the illumination of the realization of immeasurable meditation, with ten trillion bodhisattva meditations.

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu snang zhing shes par byed pa /
translated: It is the illumination and knowledge of the accomplishment of the perfection of wisdom, with ten trillion bodhisattva accomplishments of the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'byung ba rnam par sbyong ba /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sgo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i ye shes snang ba gsal bar byed pa /

analyzed: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas 'byams klas pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i chos kyi sgo snang ba byin gyis rlob pa /

analyzed: phyogs bcu 'byams klas pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i chos kyi tshul rmongs pa med cing gti mug med par smon pa /

analyzed: chos kyi 'byung gnas bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu thob @139b par byed pa /

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu 'byams klas pa la 'jug par byed pa /

analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par sgrub pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa /

analyzed: chos 'byams klas pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i tshogs rab tu sgrub pa /

analyzed: chos kyi ye shes bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mthong ba la rgyal mtshan du gyur pa /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu yang dag par ston pa'i spyod yul can /

analyzed: lha'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par dga' ba'i lus can /

analyzed: klu'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mi skyo bar lta ba /

analyzed: gnod sbyin gyi dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu thal mo sbyor zhing spyi bo la bzhag pa /

analyzed: dri za'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mi ngoms par mos pas ldang ba /
translated: ten trillion gandharva lords rising with insatiable devotion,

analyzed: lha ma yin gyi dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu nga rgyal gyi yid yongs su chud pa /

analyzed: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i kha nas dar shin tu dbyangs pa /

analyzed: mi'am ci'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu sems rab tu dga' ba /

analyzed: lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag @140a *//
translated: ten trillion mahoraga lords

original: bcus dga' ba'i yid du blta ba /
analyzed: bcus dga' ba'i yid du blta ba /
translated: with minds of joy gazing,

original: tshangs pa'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu zhes sa phu dud du gnas pa /
analyzed: tshangs pa'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu zhes sa phu dud du gnas pa /

analyzed: rab 'phrul dga'i lha'i rgyal po la sogs pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus phyag bya ba /

analyzed: dbang byed kyi lha'i rgyal po la sogs pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus thal mo sbyar ba /

analyzed: tshangs pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus blta ba; dbang phyug chen po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par brjod pa /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par bstod pa / lha'i bu mo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu mchod pa /
translated: He was praised by a hundred thousand ten-millions of bodhisattvas.🔽He was greatly worshipped by a hundred thousand ten-millions of goddesses.

analyzed: smon lam gyi lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par dga' ba /

analyzed: tshangs pa kun ris kyi lha @140b bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus bskor ba byas pa /

translated: A hundred thousand ten-millions of great Brahma gods cried out in praise of the one who had perfected a hundred thousand ten-millions of qualities.

analyzed: kun snang dang ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus 'khor lngas phyag bya ba /

analyzed: 'od chung gi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas skye ba shin tu dkon pa'i sgra bsgrags pa /

analyzed: tshad med 'od kyi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas legs par gshegs so // zhes phyag bya ba /

original: kun snang dang ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu bstod cing mngon par dga' ba'i sgra phyung ba /
