original: mi gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba blang ba med pa las byung bas lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi padmos kun nas yog pa'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings brgyan par byas so //🔽lha rdzas las 'das pa'i spos thams cad kyi mchog gi sprin gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bya ba dang / me tog kha dog mtha' yas pa sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / na bza' kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad kyi sprin dang /
analyzed: mi gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba blang ba med pa las byung bas lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi padmos kun nas yog pa'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings brgyan par byas so // lha rdzas las 'das pa'i spos thams cad kyi mchog gi sprin gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bya ba dang / me tog kha dog mtha' yas pa sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / na bza' kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad kyi sprin dang /
translated: He adorns the realm of phenomena with ornaments of lotuses made of various jewels that surpass the divine, which arise from the roots of virtue that are not subject to action or possession.🔽He fills the realm of phenomena with clouds of the most excellent incense that surpass the divine, with clouds of various flowers of infinite colors, with clouds of various garments of all different kinds,

original: tsandan gyi dri zhim po mtha' yas par 'phro ba thams cad kyi sprin dang / lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che @146b thams cad kyi gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi ngad kun tu ldang ba'i sprin dang /
analyzed: tsandan gyi dri zhim po mtha' yas par 'phro ba thams cad kyi sprin dang / lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che @146b thams cad kyi gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi ngad kun tu ldang ba'i sprin dang /
translated: with clouds of infinite sweet-smelling sandalwood, with clouds of various parasols made of all the jewels that surpass the divine, with clouds of various fragrances and incense that spread their scent everywhere,

original: phreng ba yid du 'ong ba thams cad kyi sprin dang / lha rdzas las 'das pa'i lhab lhub rnam par dag pa thams cad kyi sprin dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa rang gi lus gtong ba'i sprin dang /
analyzed: phreng ba yid du 'ong ba thams cad kyi sprin dang / lha rdzas las 'das pa'i lhab lhub rnam par dag pa thams cad kyi sprin dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa rang gi lus gtong ba'i sprin dang /
translated: clouds of inexpressibly many quintillions of bodhisattvas giving away their own bodies,🔽clouds of inexhaustible praise and eulogy that surpass the expression of the qualities of the buddhas,

original: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan brjod pa las 'das pas bstod cing bsngags pa'i brjod pa zad mi shes pa'i sprin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstod pas brjod pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par bsngags pa'i chos ma log pa byung ba /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan brjod pa las 'das pas bstod cing bsngags pa'i brjod pa zad mi shes pa'i sprin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstod pas brjod pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par bsngags pa'i chos ma log pa byung ba /
translated: and the appearance of the unmistaken Dharma that is praised just as it is by the praise of the tathagatas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi stobs mtha' dang dbus med pa las rgyu bas 'gro ba thams cad bde ba'i lam bstan pa dang / tshig rnam par 'byed pa brjod du med pa smos pas chos tshad med pa la gzhol ba'i gzungs kyi rgyud thams cad las byung ba'i tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa la mkhas pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi stobs mtha' dang dbus med pa las rgyu bas 'gro ba thams cad bde ba'i lam bstan pa dang / tshig rnam par 'byed pa brjod du med pa smos pas chos tshad med pa la gzhol ba'i gzungs kyi rgyud thams cad las byung ba'i tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa la mkhas pa /
translated: They had the skill of the knowledge of the different kinds of dhāraṇī that arises from the dhāraṇī of the endless and boundless power of the buddhas, which teaches the path of happiness to all beings.

original: mi zad pa dang mi 'jigs pas yid dga' bar gyur pa'i rim gro ngom mi shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod pa /
analyzed: mi zad pa dang mi 'jigs pas yid dga' bar gyur pa'i rim gro ngom mi shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod pa /
translated: They were skilled in the knowledge of the different kinds of dhāraṇī that arises from the dhāraṇī of the endless and fearless joy of mind, which is the inexhaustible praise of the tathāgatas.

original: tshig rnam par dbye zhing brjod pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag chos kyi dbyings kyi lus nam mkha'i khams rgyas par byed pa byin gyis brlabs te /🔽sangs rgyas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad kyis yongs su @147a *//
analyzed: tshig rnam par dbye zhing brjod pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag chos kyi dbyings kyi lus nam mkha'i khams rgyas par byed pa byin gyis brlabs te / sangs rgyas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad kyis yongs su @147a *//
translated: They had the blessing of the body of the realm of phenomena that fills the realm of space through the analysis and expression of words.

original: bzung ba'i yid kyi dbang pos mngon par bstod do //
analyzed: bzung ba'i yid kyi dbang pos mngon par bstod do //
translated: They were praised by the faculty of mind that is held by all the buddhas of the past, the future, and the present.

original: lha'i ris gzhan dang gzhan nas 'dus pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su ston cing /
analyzed: lha'i ris gzhan dang gzhan nas 'dus pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su ston cing /
translated: The entire retinue that had gathered from the other realms of the gods and the retinue of bodhisattvas who had gathered from inexpressibly many buddha realms were amazed by the inconceivable power of the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang dag par 'byung ba dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdzu 'phrul yang dag par ston pa dang / sems can grangs med pa'i rgyud tshim par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rgyan rnam par phye bas nam mkha'i khams thams cad dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang dag par 'byung ba dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdzu 'phrul yang dag par ston pa dang / sems can grangs med pa'i rgyud tshim par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rgyan rnam par phye bas nam mkha'i khams thams cad dang /
translated: They were amazed by the Tathāgata’s inconceivable magical power, which satisfied the minds of countless beings, and by the display of the adornments of the buddhas, which filled the entire realm of space

original: chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par mdzad pa /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par mdzad pa /
translated: and the entire realm of the Dharma.

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas pa brtan par mdzad pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas pa brtan par mdzad pa /
translated: They were amazed by the Tathāgata’s inconceivable power, which stabilized the infinite roots of virtue of all beings.

original: sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul gzhal du med pa las byung ba /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul gzhal du med pa las byung ba /
translated: It arose from the immeasurable miracles of the buddhas.

original: tshig gi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa /
analyzed: tshig gi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa /
translated: It is beyond all verbal paths.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rigs dang ldan pa thams cad kyis mngon par mos par bya ba /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rigs dang ldan pa thams cad kyis mngon par mos par bya ba /
translated: It is to be aspired to by all bodhisattvas who have the lineage.

original: sems can 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi sku yangs pa rjes su khyab par gyur pa /
analyzed: sems can 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi sku yangs pa rjes su khyab par gyur pa /
translated: It is the vast body of the buddhas that pervades in order to satisfy the training of beings just as it is.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba brjod pa thams cad rnam par dag pas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan tshad med pa yang dag par ston pa /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba brjod pa thams cad rnam par dag pas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan tshad med pa yang dag par ston pa /
translated: It reveals the immeasurable qualities of the buddhas through the purity of all the expressions of the roots of virtue.

original: de bzhin @147b gshegs pa'i yul rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin las byung ba /
analyzed: de bzhin @147b gshegs pa'i yul rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin las byung ba /
translated: It arises from the buddhas’ samādhi, which is the uninterrupted arising of the domain of the tathāgatas.

original: 'gro ba thams cad ma lus pa'i lus kyi rjes su bdal ba /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad ma lus pa'i lus kyi rjes su bdal ba /
translated: It pervades the bodies of all beings without exception.

original: sku'i byin gyi rlabs las mtshams med pa /
analyzed: sku'i byin gyi rlabs las mtshams med pa /
translated: It is the blessing of the body that is uninterrupted.

original: yid tshad med pa yongs su mgu bar mdzad pa /
analyzed: yid tshad med pa yongs su mgu bar mdzad pa /
translated: It satisfies the immeasurable minds of beings.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rigs rgyun mi gcod pa /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rigs rgyun mi gcod pa /
translated: He was the one who did not cut off the lineage of omniscience.

original: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa mtha' dang dbus med pa 'byung ba brnyes pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa mtha' dang dbus med pa 'byung ba brnyes pa /
translated: He was the one who had attained the arising of the infinite middle and end of the conduct of the buddhas.

original: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs su byung ba /
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs su byung ba /
translated: He was the one who had arisen in the lineage of all the buddhas of the past, the future, and the present.

original: khams dang / mos pa bgrang du med pa thams cad sbyong bar mdzad pa; byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ye shes mngon par sgrub pa la 'jug par mdzad pa /
analyzed: khams dang / mos pa bgrang du med pa thams cad sbyong bar mdzad pa; byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ye shes mngon par sgrub pa la 'jug par mdzad pa /
translated: He was the one who purified all the innumerable realms and aspirations. He was the one who caused all bodhisattvas to enter into the accomplishment of wisdom.

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang po rab tu dga' bar mdzad pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang po rab tu dga' bar mdzad pa /
translated: He was the one who delighted the faculties of all bodhisattvas.

original: chos kyi sprin gyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad du yog par mdzad pa /
analyzed: chos kyi sprin gyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad du yog par mdzad pa /
translated: He was the one who covered the entire realm of space with the cloud of the Dharma.

original: chos kyi dbyings thams cad ma lus par de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis rlob pa /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings thams cad ma lus par de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis rlob pa /
translated: He was the one who blessed the entire realm of phenomena with the blessing of the taming of the tathāgatas.

original: sems can thams cad kyi rtog pa bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rgyas par mdzad pa /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi rtog pa bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rgyas par mdzad pa /
translated: He was the one who fulfilled the thoughts and concepts of all beings.

original: mi gnas pa'i ye shes kyi rgyud kyis 'gro ba thams cad las 'phags pa /
analyzed: mi gnas pa'i ye shes kyi rgyud kyis 'gro ba thams cad las 'phags pa /
translated: He was superior to all beings through the continuum of nonabiding wisdom.

original: ye shes kyi rnam pa thams cad brnyes pa /
analyzed: ye shes kyi rnam pa thams cad brnyes pa /
translated: He had attained all aspects of wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs snang ba gzigs pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs snang ba gzigs pa /
translated: He saw the appearances of the blessings of the buddhas.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar bskyed pa bzhin du yang dag par gzigs pa /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar bskyed pa bzhin du yang dag par gzigs pa /
translated: He saw the roots of virtue just as they had been created.

original: sems bskyed pa rgya chen po skye bar mdzad @148a *//
analyzed: sems bskyed pa rgya chen po skye bar mdzad @148a *//
translated: He caused the arising of the vast generation of bodhicitta.

original: pa; 'gro ba thams cad kun tu bzang po thub pa med pa'i ye shes yang dag par rgyu bas byung ba /
analyzed: pa; 'gro ba thams cad kun tu bzang po thub pa med pa'i ye shes yang dag par rgyu bas byung ba /
translated: He had arisen through the pure movement of the wisdom that is the invincible Samantabhadra of all beings.

original: 'gro ba dang / zhing thams cad du khyab pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba dang / zhing thams cad du khyab pa /
translated: He pervaded all beings and realms.

original: chos kyi dbyings thams cad du mi ldog par gshegs pa /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings thams cad du mi ldog par gshegs pa /
translated: He had gone to all the realms of phenomena without returning.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sku'i rgyud brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa yang dag par ston pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sku'i rgyud brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa yang dag par ston pa /
translated: He revealed the inexpressibly inexpressible continuum of the body of the Buddha.

original: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'khrul pa mi mnga' bar byin gyis rlob pa /
analyzed: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'khrul pa mi mnga' bar byin gyis rlob pa /
translated: He blessed beings according to their thoughts without error.

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyi tshig gi rnam pas yon tan mi zad pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyi tshig gi rnam pas yon tan mi zad pa /
translated: He was the inexhaustible qualities of all beings through the aspects of their speech.

original: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par mdzad pa; 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med par khyab par mdzad pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par mdzad pa; 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med par khyab par mdzad pa /
translated: who pervaded all world systems without limit or center,

original: byang chub kyi sems kyis ji ltar dam bcas pa'i sems can rim gror mdzad pa /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kyis ji ltar dam bcas pa'i sems can rim gror mdzad pa /
translated: who served sentient beings in accordance with the commitments of the mind of awakening,

original: ji ltar brnyes pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad pa /
analyzed: ji ltar brnyes pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad pa /
translated: who gave the gift of the Dharma in accordance with the way it was received,

original: sems can ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du 'dul bar mdzad pa /
analyzed: sems can ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du 'dul bar mdzad pa /
translated: who guided sentient beings in accordance with the way they were to be guided,

original: mos pa dang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dag par mdzad pa /
analyzed: mos pa dang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dag par mdzad pa /
translated: who purified in accordance with the way they were inclined and aspired,

original: gzugs kyi sku bsam gyis mi khyab par byin gyis rlob pa /
analyzed: gzugs kyi sku bsam gyis mi khyab par byin gyis rlob pa /
translated: who blessed the inconceivable rūpakāya,

original: 'gro ba thams cad la gnas pa mi mnga' zhing mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su bzhud pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad la gnas pa mi mnga' zhing mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su bzhud pa /
translated: who was without abode for all beings and followed equality,

original: spyod pa tha dad pa las byung ba /
analyzed: spyod pa tha dad pa las byung ba /
translated: who arose from different kinds of conduct,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgribs pa med pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgribs pa med pa /
translated: who was the one with the ten powers of the tathāgatas that were unobstructed,

original: mngon par sangs rgyas pa /
analyzed: mngon par sangs rgyas pa /
translated: who was manifestly awakened,

original: thugs la chags pa mi mnga' bas rtag tu mnyam par bzhag cing ma 'dres pa /
analyzed: thugs la chags pa mi mnga' bas rtag tu mnyam par bzhag cing ma 'dres pa /
translated: He is always in equipoise because he is free of attachment.

original: ye shes @148b thams cad la rnam par spyod pa /
analyzed: ye shes @148b thams cad la rnam par spyod pa /
translated: He has mastery over all wisdom.

original: don dang tshig dang yi ge la dad pa yang dag par ston pa /
analyzed: don dang tshig dang yi ge la dad pa yang dag par ston pa /
translated: He teaches the meaning, the words, and the letters with faith.

original: ye shes rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la bzhugs pa /
analyzed: ye shes rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la bzhugs pa /
translated: He abides in an ocean of wisdom that is without end or middle.

original: yon tan gyi mchog ye shes kyi snying pos byung bas chos kyi dbyings thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi nyi ma shar ba /
analyzed: yon tan gyi mchog ye shes kyi snying pos byung bas chos kyi dbyings thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi nyi ma shar ba /
translated: The sun of the buddhas rises in the realm of phenomena because it is born from the essence of wisdom, which is the supreme quality.

original: 'gro ba thams cad du sngon gyi smon lam zad pa mi mnga' bar chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la gnas pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad du sngon gyi smon lam zad pa mi mnga' bar chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la gnas pa /
translated: The sun of the buddhas abides in the nature of the realm of phenomena without the exhaustion of past aspirations for all beings.

original: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa ma nyams pa brnyes pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa ma nyams pa brnyes pa /
translated: He has attained the undiminished conduct of the buddhas.

original: bdag gi dang yongs su gzung ba med pas gnas pa mi mnga' ba /
analyzed: bdag gi dang yongs su gzung ba med pas gnas pa mi mnga' ba /
translated: He has no abode because he has no self and no possessions.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad 'byung zhing /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad 'byung zhing /
translated: All supramundane phenomena arise from him.

original: 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa /
translated: He is unstained by any mundane phenomena.

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyi mi shes pa'i rgyal mtshan yang dag par bcad pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyi mi shes pa'i rgyal mtshan yang dag par bcad pa /
translated: It was the banner of ignorance for all beings.

original: 'jig rten thams cad kyi mi shes pa chen po yongs su bsal ba'i gnas su gyur pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad kyi mi shes pa chen po yongs su bsal ba'i gnas su gyur pa /
translated: It was the basis for dispelling the great ignorance of all worlds.

original: 'gro ba thams cad snang bar mngon par 'don pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad snang bar mngon par 'don pa /
translated: It was the manifestation of light for all beings.

original: 'jig rten thams cad ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa la rab tu gzhog pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa la rab tu gzhog pa /
translated: It was the establishment of all worlds in the excellence of wisdom.

original: 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'i bsod nams yongs su mi zad pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'i bsod nams yongs su mi zad pa /
translated: It was the inexhaustible merit that sustains all beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi shes pa thugs su chud pas dad par bya bar 'os pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi shes pa thugs su chud pas dad par bya bar 'os pa /
translated: It was the faith that comes from the understanding of all bodhisattvas.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gzhol ba'i byams pa chen po las byung ba /
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gzhol ba'i byams pa chen po las byung ba /
translated: It was the love that comes from the great compassion of the perfect buddhas.

original: thugs rje chen po yang dag par ston pas spyod pa /
analyzed: thugs rje chen po yang dag par ston pas spyod pa /
translated: It was the conduct that comes from the teaching of great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sku brjod du med pa'i chos dang / sangs @149a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sku brjod du med pa'i chos dang / sangs @149a *//
translated: It was the body of the Buddha, which is beyond description.

original: rgyas kyi chos sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gsung dang dbyangs kyi char 'bebs pa /
analyzed: rgyas kyi chos sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gsung dang dbyangs kyi char 'bebs pa /
translated: He rained down the Dharma, with its inconceivable variety of teachings and melodies.

original: sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par tshim par mdzad pa /
analyzed: sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par tshim par mdzad pa /
translated: He satisfied beings according to their wishes.

original: sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i mtha' dmigs pa'i byin rlabs shin tu dag cing bsam gyis mi khyab pas sems can dag par mdzad pa; byang chub sems dpa' thams cad lung bstan pa rgyun mi 'chad pa /
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i mtha' dmigs pa'i byin rlabs shin tu dag cing bsam gyis mi khyab pas sems can dag par mdzad pa; byang chub sems dpa' thams cad lung bstan pa rgyun mi 'chad pa /
translated: He purified beings through his inconceivable and pure blessings, which pervade the past, the future, and the present.

original: sangs rgyas kyi rigs su dbang bskur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud du byung ba /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi rigs su dbang bskur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud du byung ba /
translated: He was the source of the thus-gone ones, for he was consecrated in the lineage of the buddhas.

original: 'jig rten thams cad du 'khor lo mi ldog par 'khor ba /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad du 'khor lo mi ldog par 'khor ba /
translated: He turned the irreversible wheel in all worlds.

original: 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon par zhen pa thams cad las 'phags pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon par zhen pa thams cad las 'phags pa /
translated: He was superior to all the attachments of all worlds.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi mtha' klas pa la mi gnas pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi mtha' klas pa la mi gnas pa /
translated: He was not confined to any buddha realm or to the entire realm of phenomena.

original: 'gro ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid du thugs su chud pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid du thugs su chud pa /
translated: He had realized the sameness of all beings.🔽He was pure through his supramundane merit.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsod nams kyis rnam par dag pa; 'khor ba la mi bzhugs par 'jig rten thams cad du snang bar gyur pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsod nams kyis rnam par dag pa; 'khor ba la mi bzhugs par 'jig rten thams cad du snang bar gyur pa /
translated: He was present in all worlds without being in saṃsāra.

original: btsal ba mi dmigs pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi rang bzhin /
analyzed: btsal ba mi dmigs pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi rang bzhin /
translated: He was the nature of the entire realm of phenomena, which is not found through searching.

original: ye shes kyi zla ba de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa'i rjes su bzhud pa /
analyzed: ye shes kyi zla ba de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa'i rjes su bzhud pa /
translated: He was the moon of wisdom that followed the immeasurable thus-gone ones.

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i ye shes kyis byin gyis rlob pa /
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i ye shes kyis byin gyis rlob pa /
translated: He was blessed by illusory wisdom.

original: mig yor lta bu'i ye shes kyis rnam par ston pa /
analyzed: mig yor lta bu'i ye shes kyis rnam par ston pa /
translated: He was revealed by the wisdom of optical illusions.

original: rmi lam lta bur @149b rjes su dran pa /
analyzed: rmi lam lta bur @149b rjes su dran pa /
translated: He remembered what was like a dream.

original: sprul pa dang mnyam par byung ba /
analyzed: sprul pa dang mnyam par byung ba /
translated: He was like an emanation.

original: sems kyi rang bzhin lta bur 'jig rten sna tshogs thams cad byin gyis rlob pa /
analyzed: sems kyi rang bzhin lta bur 'jig rten sna tshogs thams cad byin gyis rlob pa /
translated: He blessed the entire variety of worlds with the nature of mind.

original: las kyi rnam par smin pa'i tshul dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi skye mched rnam par phye ba yang dag par ston pa /
analyzed: las kyi rnam par smin pa'i tshul dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi skye mched rnam par phye ba yang dag par ston pa /
translated: He revealed the way of the ripening of karma and the various entrances of beings according to their aspirations.

original: sems can gyi dbang po dang mthun par sangs rgyas kyi sku byung ba /
analyzed: sems can gyi dbang po dang mthun par sangs rgyas kyi sku byung ba /
translated: the buddha body that appears in accordance with the faculties of sentient beings,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dmigs pa la sems can grangs med pa'i sems yang dag par gnas pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dmigs pa la sems can grangs med pa'i sems yang dag par gnas pa /
translated: the minds of countless sentient beings being correctly focused on the perception of the Tathāgata,

original: 'jig rten thams cad rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnam par bsten pa'i rang bzhin du chos kyi mtshan nyid kyis yang dag par spyod pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnam par bsten pa'i rang bzhin du chos kyi mtshan nyid kyis yang dag par spyod pa /
translated: the correct practice of the characteristics of phenomena in the nature of the teaching of dependent origination in all worlds,

original: ye shes kyi rgyud mtshan nyid med pa'i rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid gcig tu gyur pa /
analyzed: ye shes kyi rgyud mtshan nyid med pa'i rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid gcig tu gyur pa /
translated: the single characteristic of the nature of the characteristic of the stream of wisdom,

original: 'jig rten thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid snang ba mngon par sgrub pa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston cing /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid snang ba mngon par sgrub pa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston cing /
translated: the teaching of the practice of the accomplishment of the appearance of the characteristic of the nature of all worlds,

original: 'gro ba thams cad gdon par brtson pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad gdon par brtson pa /
translated: the striving to liberate all beings,

original: sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul bla na med pa yang dag par ston pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul bla na med pa yang dag par ston pa /
translated: the teaching of the unsurpassable domain of the buddhas,

original: 'jig rten dang zhing thams cad yongs su skyob pas sangs rgyas kyi mtshan ma gzung bar 'jig rten du mngon par byung ba /
analyzed: 'jig rten dang zhing thams cad yongs su skyob pas sangs rgyas kyi mtshan ma gzung bar 'jig rten du mngon par byung ba /
translated: He had appeared in the world with the marks of a buddha in order to protect all worlds and realms.

original: 'jig rten gyi nyon mongs pa'i mtshan ma thams cad rnam par bsal ba /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi nyon mongs pa'i mtshan ma thams cad rnam par bsal ba /
translated: He had eliminated all the marks of the kleśas of the world.

original: 'jig rten thams cad kyi rjes su dran pa dang / dmigs par 'byor bar gyur pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad kyi rjes su dran pa dang / dmigs par 'byor bar gyur pa /
translated: He had the power of recollection and focus for all worlds.🔽He had the great vehicle, the cause for understanding without disturbance.🔽He had the face of the Mahāyāna, which is the cause for understanding without disturbance.

original: 'khrug pa med par khong du chud par 'gyur ba'i rgyu theg pa chen pos zhal yongs su rgyas pa /🔽chos thams @150a *//
analyzed: 'khrug pa med par khong du chud par 'gyur ba'i rgyu theg pa chen pos zhal yongs su rgyas pa / chos thams @150a *//
translated: He had the face of the Mahāyāna, which is the cause for understanding without disturbance.

original: cad kyi don grub pa /
analyzed: cad kyi don grub pa /
translated: He had accomplished the meaning of all Dharmas.

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par phye ba /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par phye ba /
translated: He was distinguished by the roots of merit of all beings.

original: nyams pa med pa'i 'phrin las rnam par smin pas rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: nyams pa med pa'i 'phrin las rnam par smin pas rnam par dag pa /
translated: His pure ripening was the result of his undiminishing activity.

original: ye shes kyi 'byung gnas dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du thugs su chud pa /
analyzed: ye shes kyi 'byung gnas dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du thugs su chud pa /
translated: He was the source of wisdom, and he had realized the equality of the three times.

original: 'jig rten thams cad kyi yongs su rtog pa yongs su mi rtog pas byung ba /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad kyi yongs su rtog pa yongs su mi rtog pas byung ba /
translated: He had arisen without any conceptualization of the conceptualizations of all worlds.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'od zer gyi dra bas gsal bar gyur pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'od zer gyi dra bas gsal bar gyur pa /
translated: He illuminated all world systems with a net of light rays.

original: phyogs bcu 'byams klas pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis snang bar mdzad pa /
analyzed: phyogs bcu 'byams klas pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis snang bar mdzad pa /
translated: He illuminated the entire vastness of the ten directions with the light of the buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su bzhud pa blta bas mi ngoms shing btang mi bra ba /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su bzhud pa blta bas mi ngoms shing btang mi bra ba /
translated: He was the one who was never satisfied with seeing the buddhas and was never satisfied with the bodhisattva conduct.

original: yon tan chen po dang / ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'byung ba dang / dbang po mngon par mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul can /
analyzed: yon tan chen po dang / ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'byung ba dang / dbang po mngon par mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul can /
translated: He was the one who had the field of experience of the wisdom that knows the higher cognitions, great qualities, and wisdom of the bodhisattvas.

original: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgyas par mdzad pa /
analyzed: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgyas par mdzad pa /
translated: He was the one who expanded the activities of the buddhas with the maṇḍala of wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las shin tu sgrub pa nub cing /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las shin tu sgrub pa nub cing /
translated: He was the one who had accomplished the activity of the buddhas.

original: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul ston pa /
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul ston pa /
translated: He was the one who taught the way of omniscience in the past, the future, and the present.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs mtha' yas pa'i char 'bebs pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs mtha' yas pa'i char 'bebs pa /
translated: He was the one who rained down the infinite dhāraṇīs of the bodhisattvas.

original: bsam pa yangs pa'i sgom pa yongs su 'dzin par mdzad pa /
analyzed: bsam pa yangs pa'i sgom pa yongs su 'dzin par mdzad pa /
translated: He was the one who held the meditation of vast thought.

original: sangs rgyas kyi dpal thams cad kyis rab tu 'bar ba /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi dpal thams cad kyis rab tu 'bar ba /
translated: He was the one who was ablaze with the splendor of all the buddhas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku kha dog mtha' yas pa sna tshogs su 'jig @150b rten thams cad la mngon par ston pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku kha dog mtha' yas pa sna tshogs su 'jig @150b rten thams cad la mngon par ston pa /
translated: He was the one who manifested to all worlds the infinite and various colors of the body of the Tathāgata.

original: sgrib pa'i chos thams cad du ma lhung ba /
analyzed: sgrib pa'i chos thams cad du ma lhung ba /
translated: He was the one who did not fall into any of the phenomena of obscuration.

original: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyis don gyis dag pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyis don gyis dag pa /
translated: He was the one who was pure in meaning through the nature of all phenomena.

original: yon tan gyi chos thams cad la mnga' bas mdzes pa'i dkyil 'khor can /
analyzed: yon tan gyi chos thams cad la mnga' bas mdzes pa'i dkyil 'khor can /
translated: He was the one who had a beautiful maṇḍala through his mastery of all the qualities of the Dharma.

original: yon tan gyi 'od zer mnga' ba'i nyi mar gyur pa /
analyzed: yon tan gyi 'od zer mnga' ba'i nyi mar gyur pa /
translated: He was the one who was the sun of the light rays of qualities.

original: bsod nams kyi zhing du shar ba /
analyzed: bsod nams kyi zhing du shar ba /
translated: He was the one who rose as the field of merit.

original: gzi brjid thams cad kyi dra bas mngon par skyes pa /🔽'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa yang dag par 'dzin pa /
analyzed: gzi brjid thams cad kyi dra bas mngon par skyes pa / 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa yang dag par 'dzin pa /
translated: He was the one who was born from the net of all splendor.🔽He was the one who held the emanations of the buddhas in all worlds.

original: 'jig rten thams cad sprul par thugs su chud pa'i ye shes snang ba dang ldan pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad sprul par thugs su chud pa'i ye shes snang ba dang ldan pa /
translated: He was the one who had the light of wisdom that understood all worlds to be emanations.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i go 'phang chags pa med pa mnga' ba /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i go 'phang chags pa med pa mnga' ba /
translated: He is the one who has attained the state of a thus-gone one, free of attachment.

original: phyi ma'i mtha'i yon tan 'jig rten thams cad kyis rnam par shes pa /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha'i yon tan 'jig rten thams cad kyis rnam par shes pa /
translated: His qualities are known in all worlds until the end of time.

original: 'gro ba thams cad dang mthun par ston pa'i ye shes kyi phyag mnga' ba /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad dang mthun par ston pa'i ye shes kyi phyag mnga' ba /
translated: He has the wisdom hand that teaches in accordance with all beings.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi sman pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi sman pa /
translated: He is the thus-gone one, the doctor of wisdom.

original: sems can thams cad bde bar mdzad pa /
analyzed: sems can thams cad bde bar mdzad pa /
translated: He brings happiness to all beings.

original: 'jig rten tshad med pa thams cad du shin tu rnam par dag pas rjes su 'brang ba /
analyzed: 'jig rten tshad med pa thams cad du shin tu rnam par dag pas rjes su 'brang ba /
translated: He is followed by the completely pure ones in all the immeasurable worlds.

original: 'gro ba dang zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad du phyir mi ldog pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba dang zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad du phyir mi ldog pa /
translated: He is irreversible in all the infinite realms and universes.

original: ye shes kyi spyan phugs rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: ye shes kyi spyan phugs rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa /
translated: His wisdom eye is free of cataracts and is completely pure.

original: sangs rgyas kyi lo legs pa yang dag par ston pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi lo legs pa yang dag par ston pa /
translated: He is the one who perfectly reveals the good harvest of the buddhas.

original: 'khu ba'i sems can gyi khams las su rung bar mdzad pa /
analyzed: 'khu ba'i sems can gyi khams las su rung bar mdzad pa /
translated: He is the one who makes the elements of beings who are hostile pliable.

original: 'dul ba sna tshogs du ma la 'jug pa /
analyzed: 'dul ba sna tshogs du ma la 'jug pa /
translated: He is the one who engages in many different kinds of training.

original: dus bzhin du 'dul ba'i rgyun mi 'chad pa /
analyzed: dus bzhin du 'dul ba'i rgyun mi 'chad pa /
translated: He is the one who trains without interruption at the right time.

original: @151a *// 'gro ba thams cad la mnyam pa'i thugs kyis yang dag par spyod pa las skyon med pa'i rnam par smin pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag par ston pa; bsam pa dang / las dang / rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam par ston pa /
analyzed: @151a *// 'gro ba thams cad la mnyam pa'i thugs kyis yang dag par spyod pa las skyon med pa'i rnam par smin pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag par ston pa; bsam pa dang / las dang / rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam par ston pa /
translated: He taught nirvana, and he manifested the buddha body according to the results of aspirations, karma, and natural outflow.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sku ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyis chos shes pa 'byung bar mdzad pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sku ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyis chos shes pa 'byung bar mdzad pa /
translated: He caused beings to understand the Dharma according to the buddha body.

original: sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa /
translated: He blessed the emanations of the buddhas.

original: 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad la rnam par gzigs pa'i ye shes mnga' ba /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad la rnam par gzigs pa'i ye shes mnga' ba /
translated: He had the wisdom that sees all worldly phenomena.

original: dga' ba chen po dang lhag pa'i bsam pas dbang po dga' bar mdzad pa /
analyzed: dga' ba chen po dang lhag pa'i bsam pas dbang po dga' bar mdzad pa /
translated: He delighted the senses with great joy and higher motivation.

original: sangs rgyas mthong ba'i dad pa'i shugs mtha' yas pas byung ba /
analyzed: sangs rgyas mthong ba'i dad pa'i shugs mtha' yas pas byung ba /
translated: He had the power of faith in seeing the Buddha.

original: sems can thams cad kyi rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba phyir mi ldog par mdzad pa /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba phyir mi ldog par mdzad pa /
translated: He caused the roots of virtue of all beings to be irreversible.

original: sems can gyi las ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar mdzad pa /
analyzed: sems can gyi las ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar mdzad pa /
translated: He was the one who followed the karma of sentient beings exactly as it was.

original: 'gro ba gnyid kyis log pa thams cad sad par mdzad pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba gnyid kyis log pa thams cad sad par mdzad pa /
translated: He was the one who awakened all beings who were asleep.

original: sangs rgyas skye bas dge ba yang dag par 'phel bar mdzad pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas skye bas dge ba yang dag par 'phel bar mdzad pa /
translated: He was the one who increased the virtue of the birth of the buddhas.

original: sems can la sangs rgyas kyi bag dbab pa /
analyzed: sems can la sangs rgyas kyi bag dbab pa /
translated: He was the one who instilled the buddha nature in sentient beings.

original: chen po stobs pa mdzad pa /
analyzed: chen po stobs pa mdzad pa /
translated: He was the one who gave the great gift.🔽He was the one who did not abide in any worldly view.

original: 'jig rten gyi lta ba thams cad la mi gnas pa; ye shes kyi don la rab tu gzhog pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi lta ba thams cad la mi gnas pa; ye shes kyi don la rab tu gzhog pa /
translated: He was the one who brought beings to the meaning of wisdom.

original: rab tu gzhag pa'i ye shes kyi tshul gyi spyod yul thugs su chud pa /
analyzed: rab tu gzhag pa'i ye shes kyi tshul gyi spyod yul thugs su chud pa /
translated: He was the one who understood the domain of the way of the wisdom of bringing beings to the Dharma.

original: sangs rgyas kyis gzigs pa'i zil gyis non @151b pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyis gzigs pa'i zil gyis non @151b pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
translated: He was the one who was adorned with the adornment of the splendor of the vision of the buddhas.

original: chos kyi rgyud thugs su chud pa'i ri bo rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: chos kyi rgyud thugs su chud pa'i ri bo rnam par dag pa /
translated: He was the one who purified the mountain of the understanding of the continuum of the Dharma.

original: sangs rgyas 'byams klas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dang gzhan du ston pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'byams klas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dang gzhan du ston pa /
translated: He was the one who revealed the buddhas and bodhisattvas to others.

original: kha na ma tho ba med pa'i sa la sems can rab tu 'god pa /
analyzed: kha na ma tho ba med pa'i sa la sems can rab tu 'god pa /
translated: He was the one who brought beings to the stage that is free of misdeeds.

original: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan grangs med pas rnam par bris pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan grangs med pas rnam par bris pa /
translated: He is the one who is painted with the countless qualities of the Buddha.

original: las kyis sna tshogs su gyur pa'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston pa /
analyzed: las kyis sna tshogs su gyur pa'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston pa /
translated: He is the one who reveals the Tathāgata in the various worlds that are created by karma.

original: sangs rgyas kyi 'byung gnas rnam par sbyong ba /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi 'byung gnas rnam par sbyong ba /
translated: He is the one who purifies the source of the buddhas.

original: ye shes thams cad yongs su 'thob par mdzad pa /
analyzed: ye shes thams cad yongs su 'thob par mdzad pa /
translated: He is the one who causes the attainment of all wisdom.

original: 'jig rten thams cad kyi smon lam rjes su srung ba /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad kyi smon lam rjes su srung ba /
translated: He is the one who protects the aspirations of all worlds.

original: mi shigs pa /
analyzed: mi shigs pa /
translated: He is the one who is indestructible.

original: 'gro ba thams cad la dge ba'i bshes gnyen ston pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad la dge ba'i bshes gnyen ston pa /
translated: He is the one who reveals the spiritual friend to all beings.

original: snang ba dri ma med cing mchog tu dag par mdzad pa /
analyzed: snang ba dri ma med cing mchog tu dag par mdzad pa /
translated: He is the one who purifies the stainless light to the highest degree.

original: 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad kyis ji tsam du mngon sum du mthong ba de tsam du brjod du med pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad kyis ji tsam du mngon sum du mthong ba de tsam du brjod du med pa /
translated: He is the one who is inexpressible to the extent that he is seen by all beings without exception.

original: sems can thams cad kyi 'gro ba'i rjes su song ba'i byin gyi rlabs mnga' ba /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi 'gro ba'i rjes su song ba'i byin gyi rlabs mnga' ba /
translated: He is the one who has the blessing of following the migrations of all beings.

original: grogs sngon du 'gro ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas sems can rnam par dag par mdzad pa /
analyzed: grogs sngon du 'gro ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas sems can rnam par dag par mdzad pa /
translated: He is the one who purifies beings through roots of virtue that are preceded by friendship.

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyi smon lam gyi rjes su song ba /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyi smon lam gyi rjes su song ba /
translated: It was in accord with the aspirations of all beings.

original: nyams pa med pa /
analyzed: nyams pa med pa /
translated: It was without decline.

original: sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bzung bas dag par mdzad pa las bsags pa'i tshul gyis yongs su byung ba /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bzung bas dag par mdzad pa las bsags pa'i tshul gyis yongs su byung ba /
translated: It was purified by the accumulation of the roots of merit of all beings.

original: bdud kyi dkrug ma thams cad rnam par 'joms par byung ba /
analyzed: bdud kyi dkrug ma thams cad rnam par 'joms par byung ba /
translated: It was the vanquisher of all the māras.

original: chags pa @152a *//
analyzed: chags pa @152a *//
translated: It was free of attachment.

original: med pa'i mtha'i stobs kyis byung ba /
analyzed: med pa'i mtha'i stobs kyis byung ba /
translated: It was the power of the limitless.

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyis blta na 'od shin tu dang bar snang ba /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyis blta na 'od shin tu dang bar snang ba /
translated: It was the light that was seen by all beings.

original: ye shes kyi dbyings chags pa med pa'i snying po'i nyi ma sems can gang yang rung ba la chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad pa /
analyzed: ye shes kyi dbyings chags pa med pa'i snying po'i nyi ma sems can gang yang rung ba la chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad pa /
translated: It was the sun of the essence of the realm of wisdom that is free of attachment, which gives the gift of the Dharma to any being.

original: 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mdzod mtha' dang dbus med pa /
analyzed: 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mdzod mtha' dang dbus med pa /
translated: It was the treasury of the circle of light rays that is without end or middle.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mnga' ba /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mnga' ba /
translated: It was the domain of the wisdom of the power of the tathāgatas.

original: 'gro ba thams cad la snang bar gyur pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad la snang bar gyur pa /
translated: It was the light of all beings.

original: bsam pa dang yang dag par rtogs pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa /
analyzed: bsam pa dang yang dag par rtogs pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa /
translated: the perfection of all thoughts and realizations,

original: phyir rgol ba shin tu bcom pa /
analyzed: phyir rgol ba shin tu bcom pa /
translated: the complete destruction of all opposition,

original: yon tan gyi gnas dam pa mchog tu gyur pa /
analyzed: yon tan gyi gnas dam pa mchog tu gyur pa /
translated: the supreme and holy abode of all good qualities,

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa /
translated: the support for all beings,

original: yon tan tshad med par gyur pa /
analyzed: yon tan tshad med par gyur pa /
translated: the source of immeasurable good qualities,🔽the purifier of all beings,

original: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dag par mdzad pa; dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu tshad med par yongs su 'dzin pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dag par mdzad pa; dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu tshad med par yongs su 'dzin pa /
translated: the one who takes up immeasurable roots of virtue,

original: zad mi shes pa'i ye shes kyi sar 'dzud cing rab tu gzhog pa /
analyzed: zad mi shes pa'i ye shes kyi sar 'dzud cing rab tu gzhog pa /
translated: the one who leads to and establishes the stage of inexhaustible wisdom,

original: 'jig rten thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba sems la rag lus par yid ches pas tshad med pa'i bsod nams dang yon tan dag par mdzad pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba sems la rag lus par yid ches pas tshad med pa'i bsod nams dang yon tan dag par mdzad pa /
translated: the one who, by the power of the mind, causes the roots of virtue of all worlds to be purified and to become immeasurable merit and good qualities,

original: ye shes kyi tshul gyis ngan song gsum gyi 'gro ba yongs su skyob pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi tshul gyis ngan song gsum gyi 'gro ba yongs su skyob pa'o //
translated: and the one who, by the method of wisdom, protects all beings from the three lower realms.

original: zhes rnam pa de lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa la mos pa /
analyzed: zhes rnam pa de lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa la mos pa /
translated: Thus, with such an attitude toward the Tathāgata,

original: rnam pa de lta bur yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la yang dag par lta ba /
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bur yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la yang dag par lta ba /
translated: They saw the perfect Buddha as he truly is.

original: rnam pa de lta bur ye shes kyi mu stegs @152b las 'bab pa /
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bur ye shes kyi mu stegs @152b las 'bab pa /
translated: They saw the Buddha as the one who has crossed over to the other side of the ocean of wisdom.

original: rnam pa de lta bu'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i gang chen mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa /
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i gang chen mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa /
translated: They saw the Buddha as the one who has entered the ocean of all the great qualities of the ocean of wisdom.

original: rnam pa de lta bu'i ye shes kyi nam mkha'i rjes su phyin par rjes su 'gro ba /
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu'i ye shes kyi nam mkha'i rjes su phyin par rjes su 'gro ba /
translated: They saw the Buddha as the one who has gone to the end of the sky of wisdom.

original: rnam pa de lta bur 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du yang dag pa ji lta bar shes pa /
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bur 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du yang dag pa ji lta bar shes pa /
translated: They saw the Buddha as the one who is the field of merit for all beings.

original: rnam pa de lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i sgos lta ba /
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i sgos lta ba /
translated: They saw the Buddha as the one who is seen by the power of remembering the Tathāgata.

original: rnam pa de lta bur dge ba'i 'phrin las rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa la rtog pa /
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bur dge ba'i 'phrin las rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa la rtog pa /
translated: They saw the Buddha as the one who is contemplated by the Tathāgata through the perfection of the pure characteristics of virtuous activity.

original: rnam pa de lta bu'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku chen po 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bar byed pa /
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku chen po 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bar byed pa /
translated: They saw the Buddha as the one whose great body of perfect buddhahood illuminates all world systems.

original: rnam pa de lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba thams cad yang dag par bstan pa rjes su sems pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bcom ldan 'das kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba thams cad yang dag par bstan pa rjes su sems pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bcom ldan 'das kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig
translated: They were contemplating the teaching of the Tathāgata’s entire manifestation of the buddha’s body, the light rays that were emerging from each of the pores of the body of the Bhagavat,

original: brgya stong grangs med pa 'byung ba /
analyzed: brgya stong grangs med pa 'byung ba /
translated: the countless quintillions of light rays,

original: grangs med par rnam par dag pa /🔽grangs med par shin tu snang ba /
analyzed: grangs med par rnam par dag pa / grangs med par shin tu snang ba /
translated: the countless purities,🔽the countless appearances,

original: grangs med par bltar yod pa /
analyzed: grangs med par bltar yod pa /
translated: the countless views,

original: grangs med pa'i sems can gyi dga' ba skyed pa /
analyzed: grangs med pa'i sems can gyi dga' ba skyed pa /
translated: the countless productions of the joy of beings,

original: grangs med pa'i spro ba skyed pa; grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas la 'dun pa rnam par 'phel bar byed pa /
analyzed: grangs med pa'i spro ba skyed pa; grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas la 'dun pa rnam par 'phel bar byed pa /
translated: the countless productions of delight, the countless increases of aspiration for the buddhas,

original: grangs med pa'i lhag ba'i bsam pa rnam par sbyong ba /🔽grangs med pa'i dbang po sim par byed @153a *//
analyzed: grangs med pa'i lhag ba'i bsam pa rnam par sbyong ba /🔽grangs med pa'i dbang po sim par byed @153a *//
translated: the countless purifications of higher motivation,🔽the countless satisfactions of the senses,

original: pa; grangs med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul thob par byed pa mang po mthong bar gyur to //
analyzed: pa; grangs med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul thob par byed pa mang po mthong bar gyur to //
translated: I saw many who had attained the domain of the thus-gone ones beyond number.🔽

original: 'od kyi 'khor lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis 'phrul zhing 'byung ba /🔽kha dog bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
analyzed: 'od kyi 'khor lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis 'phrul zhing 'byung ba / kha dog bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
translated: and the inconceivable light-circles of hundreds of thousands of quintillions of light rays emanating from the Tathāgata’s body.🔽They had inconceivable colors,

original: mdog bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
analyzed: mdog bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
translated: inconceivable hues,

original: 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
analyzed: 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
translated: and inconceivable radiance.

original: chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad rgyas par byed pa /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad rgyas par byed pa /
translated: They pervaded the entire realm of phenomena without limit or center.

original: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sems can rnam par dag pas dri zhim por rab tu byung ba /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sems can rnam par dag pas dri zhim por rab tu byung ba /

original: tshigs su bcad pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'dzin pa /
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'dzin pa /

original: 'jig rten thams cad las rnam par 'das shing /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad las rnam par 'das shing /

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su byung ba /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su byung ba /

analyzed: rgyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa / yang dag par ston pa /

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa zad mi shes pa las byung ba /

original: ye shes kyi sgo la rab tu gzhog pa /

original: don yangs pa shin tu ston pa /
analyzed: don yangs pa shin tu ston pa /

original: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa brjod du med pa'i tshul yang dag par ston pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa brjod du med pa'i tshul yang dag par ston pa /

original: @153b sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' dang dbus med pa /
analyzed: @153b sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' dang dbus med pa /

original: chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug pa /

original: 'gro ba thams cad rnam par dag pa /

original: byed pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas 'dus pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor du ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa grangs med pa dag na sems ma dad pa rnams dad par bya
analyzed: byed pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas 'dus pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor du ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa grangs med pa dag na sems ma dad pa rnams dad par bya
translated: In this way, he inspired faith in those who had no faith in the infinite, countless, inexpressible, and innumerable hundreds of thousands of millions of billions of buddhas’ fields.

original: ba dang / sems dad pa rnams rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / sems rnam par 'phel ba rnams rnam par dag par bya ba dang / sems rnam par dag pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sems yongs su smin pa rnams 'dul bar bya ba dang /
analyzed: ba dang / sems dad pa rnams rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / sems rnam par 'phel ba rnams rnam par dag par bya ba dang / sems rnam par dag pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sems yongs su smin pa rnams 'dul bar bya ba dang /
translated: He increased the faith of those who had faith. He purified the minds of those whose minds were pure. He ripened the minds of those whose minds were ripe. He disciplined the minds of those whose minds were disciplined.

original: chos zab mo khong du chud par bya ba dang / ye shes snang ba mtha' dang dbus med pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / sems tshad med pa rnams rgya che bar bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa las phyir mi ldog par bya ba dang /
analyzed: chos zab mo khong du chud par bya ba dang / ye shes snang ba mtha' dang dbus med pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / sems tshad med pa rnams rgya che bar bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa las phyir mi ldog par bya ba dang /
translated: It is to comprehend the profound Dharma, to comprehend the boundless light of wisdom, to expand the immeasurability of the mind, and to not turn back from arousing the mind toward omniscience.

original: chos nyid dang mi 'gal bar bya ba dang / yang dag pa'i mthas mi skrag par bya ba dang / de bzhin nyid rab tu rtogs par bya ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang rab tu rdzogs par bya ba dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par sbyang bar bya ba dang /
analyzed: chos nyid dang mi 'gal bar bya ba dang / yang dag pa'i mthas mi skrag par bya ba dang / de bzhin nyid rab tu rtogs par bya ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang rab tu rdzogs par bya ba dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par sbyang bar bya ba dang /
translated: It is to not contradict reality, to not be frightened by the limit of reality, to realize suchness, to perfect the perfections, to purify the roots of virtue that transcend the world, and to be free from the afflictions of the world.

original: dmigs pa thams cad la brtson pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang kun tu @154b bzang po'i tshul du mos par bya ba dang / bdud kyi yul las rnam par ldog par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul 'thob par bya ba dang /
analyzed: dmigs pa thams cad la brtson pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang kun tu @154b bzang po'i tshul du mos par bya ba dang / bdud kyi yul las rnam par ldog par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul 'thob par bya ba dang /
translated: It is to be dedicated to all objects of meditation while aspiring to the way of universal excellence. It is to turn away from the domain of Māra and to attain the domain of the buddhas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid shes par bya ba dang / ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa skye bar bya ba dang / theg pa chen po'i smon lam las phyir mi ldog par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas blta ba las mi 'phang bar bya ba dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid shes par bya ba dang / ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa skye bar bya ba dang / theg pa chen po'i smon lam las phyir mi ldog par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas blta ba las mi 'phang bar bya ba dang /
translated: It is to understand the nature of the thus-gone ones, to give rise to inconceivable wisdom, to not turn back from the aspirations of the Great Vehicle, and to never be without the vision of the buddhas.

original: ye shes khong du chud par bya ba tshad med pa rtogs par bya ba dang / sa mtshams med pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs yang dag par yongs su bsgrub par bya ba dang / shin tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed par bya ba dang / the tshom med pa'i sa la 'jug par bya ba dang /
analyzed: ye shes khong du chud par bya ba tshad med pa rtogs par bya ba dang / sa mtshams med pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs yang dag par yongs su bsgrub par bya ba dang / shin tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed par bya ba dang / the tshom med pa'i sa la 'jug par bya ba dang /
translated: It is to realize the immeasurable comprehension of wisdom, to perfect the power of merit that is without limit, to give rise to a joyful mind, and to enter the level of certainty.

original: kha na ma tho ba med cing yongs su dag pa 'thob par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten pa so sor thob par bya ba dang / chos mthong ba las phyir mi ldog par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi tshogs kyi rjes su 'jug par bya ba dang /
analyzed: kha na ma tho ba med cing yongs su dag pa 'thob par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten pa so sor thob par bya ba dang / chos mthong ba las phyir mi ldog par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi tshogs kyi rjes su 'jug par bya ba dang /
translated: He should attain the state of being free from faults and be completely pure. He should attain the state of being based on omniscience. He should not turn back from seeing the Dharma. He should follow the accumulations of all bodhisattvas.

original: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs grub par bya ba de lta de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rje chen po kun tu khyab pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phung po chen pos byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa mang po yang dag par bstan to //
analyzed: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs grub par bya ba de lta de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rje chen po kun tu khyab pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phung po chen pos byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa mang po yang dag par bstan to //
translated: He should accomplish the lineage of all buddhas of the three times. In this way, the Blessed One, with his all-pervading great compassion and the great mass of omniscient wisdom, has revealed many different kinds of adornments of blessings.

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i dbang du sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba brjod pa'i @155a *//

translated: In this way, the Blessed One, for the sake of taming all beings, has described the greatness of the Buddha's nature.
