translated: He is dedicated to the practice of all good qualities.🔽He is dedicated to the practice of all good

original: sems can gyi sems kyi rgyud stor bas byang chub sems dpa'i go cha chen po bgos pa las ring bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can gyi sems kyi rgyud stor bas byang chub sems dpa'i go cha chen po bgos pa las ring bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not lose the continuity of their minds.

original: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i smon lam dkrug ma'i rnyog pa thams cad kyis bcil bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i smon lam dkrug ma'i rnyog pa thams cad kyis bcil bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not become entangled in the mud of all the confusions of the net of prayers to protect all beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i rtsom pa chen po sems can drin du mi gzo ba mthong bas lhod par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i rtsom pa chen po sems can drin du mi gzo ba mthong bas lhod par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not become lazy in their great undertakings for enlightenment, even when they see ungrateful beings.

original: byang chub tu dmigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sems can mi srun pa'i dbang pos zhum par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub tu dmigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sems can mi srun pa'i dbang pos zhum par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not become discouraged in their roots of virtue that are focused on enlightenment, even when they see beings who are difficult to tame.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ba bzhin las byis pa'i skye bo dang 'grogs pa las 'phang bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ba bzhin las byis pa'i skye bo dang 'grogs pa las 'phang bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not become discouraged in their roots of virtue, even when they associate with childish beings.

original: sems can gyi skyon gyis skyo bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can gyi skyon gyis skyo bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not become weary of the faults of beings.

original: 'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
analyzed: 'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
translated: The noble Great Collection Sūtra

original: bam po sum cu rtsa gnyis pa /
analyzed: bam po sum cu rtsa gnyis pa /
translated: Chapter Thirty-Two

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: dkyil 'khor 'di ni /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'di ni /
translated: This maṇḍala

original: @175b bsgribs pa med par 'gro ba thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: @175b bsgribs pa med par 'gro ba thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir 'byung ba ste /
translated: It arises in order to purify all beings without obscuration.

original: sems can gcig la dmigs shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba ma yin /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: sems can gcig la dmigs shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba ma yin / 'di lta ste /
translated: Bodhisattvas do not dedicate their sources of good to unsurpassable, utterly pure, perfect enlightenment by focusing on a single being.

original: zhing rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir zhing gcig la dmigs te byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems la mngon par spro ba ma yin /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: zhing rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir zhing gcig la dmigs te byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems la mngon par spro ba ma yin / 'di lta ste /
translated: Bodhisattvas do not take delight in the thought of enlightenment by focusing on a single buddha field in order to purify a buddha field.

original: sangs rgyas blta ba rnam par dmigs pa'i phyir sangs rgyas gcig la dmigs te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dad pa skye ba ma yin /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas blta ba rnam par dmigs pa'i phyir sangs rgyas gcig la dmigs te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dad pa skye ba ma yin / 'di lta ste /
translated: Bodhisattvas do not develop faith by focusing on a single buddha in order to perceive the vision of the Buddha.

original: ye shes gcig rjes su rtogs pa'i phyir ye shes gcig la dmigs nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam skye ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: ye shes gcig rjes su rtogs pa'i phyir ye shes gcig la dmigs nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam skye ba ma yin gyi /
translated: Bodhisattvas do not develop aspirations by focusing on a single gnosis in order to realize a single gnosis.

original: 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: In this way, they dedicate the roots of virtue for the sake of protecting all sentient beings.

original: zhing thams cad yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: zhing thams cad yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: They dedicate the roots of virtue for the sake of purifying all realms.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad blta ba la dmigs nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dad pa skye'o //🔽sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi ye shes kyis rjes su rtogs par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par @176a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad blta ba la dmigs nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dad pa skye'o // sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi ye shes kyis rjes su rtogs par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par @176a *//
translated: The faith of the bodhisattvas arises with the aim of seeing all the buddhas, in order to worship and serve all the buddhas.

original: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba rnams kyi smon lam skye'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba rnams kyi smon lam skye'o //
translated: The prayers of the bodhisattva great beings arise for the sake of dedicating the roots of virtue to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, in order to realize the wisdom of the Dharma of all the buddhas.

original: de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi stobs la dmigs pa la sems yangs pa /
analyzed: de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi stobs la dmigs pa la sems yangs pa /
translated: And it is like this: the bodhisattva great beings have a vast mind that focuses on the power of the buddhas.

original: bsam pa ma 'khums pa /
analyzed: bsam pa ma 'khums pa /
translated: the mind that is not contracted,

original: bskal pa thams cad du shin tu dkon pa'i sems rin po che dang ldan pa rnams kyi sems ni /
analyzed: bskal pa thams cad du shin tu dkon pa'i sems rin po che dang ldan pa rnams kyi sems ni /
translated: the mind that is endowed with the precious mind that is very rare in all the world-realms,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: the mind that is like this:

original: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir rab tu skyes te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir rab tu skyes te /
translated: it is born from the sameness of all the Buddhas.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yang dag par mthong nas sems dad pa chen po rnam par dag pa dang / snying rje chen po brtan pas bsngo zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngos te /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yang dag par mthong nas sems dad pa chen po rnam par dag pa dang / snying rje chen po brtan pas bsngo zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngos te /
translated: In this way, the Bodhisattva, the great being, having seen those roots of virtue, dedicates them with a pure, great faith and a firm great compassion, and he dedicates those roots of virtue to all sentient beings.

original: de yang tshig tsam du ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de yang tshig tsam du ma yin gyi /
translated: And that is not just words.

original: bsam pa thag pas yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: bsam pa thag pas yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He dedicates them with a sincere intention.

original: de yang dga' ba'i sems dang / rab tu dga' ba'i sems dang / dad pa'i sems dang / mos pa'i sems dang / 'byams pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / nye ba'i sems dang / snying brtse ba'i sems dang / phan gdags pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: de yang dga' ba'i sems dang / rab tu dga' ba'i sems dang / dad pa'i sems dang / mos pa'i sems dang / 'byams pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / nye ba'i sems dang / snying brtse ba'i sems dang / phan gdags pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: They dedicate with a mind of joy, a mind of delight, a mind of faith, a mind of devotion, a mind of openness, a mind of love, a mind of intimacy, a mind of compassion, and a mind of altruism.

original: de yang 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: de yang 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: They dedicate in the following way:

original: bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad kyi 'gro ba rnam par dag par gyur cig /
analyzed: bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad kyi 'gro ba rnam par dag par gyur cig /
translated: “By this root of merit, may all sentient beings have pure destinies.

original: skye ba yongs su @176b dag par gyur cig /
analyzed: skye ba yongs su @176b dag par gyur cig /
translated: May their rebirths be pure.

original: bsod nams kyi bdag nyid che ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /🔽zil gyis mi non par gyur cig /
analyzed: bsod nams kyi bdag nyid che ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig / zil gyis mi non par gyur cig /
translated: May their great merit be perfected.🔽May they be invincible.

original: mi zad par gyur cig /🔽thub par dka' ba'i sems su gyur cig /
analyzed: mi zad par gyur cig / thub par dka' ba'i sems su gyur cig /
translated: May they be inexhaustible.🔽May they have invincible minds.

original: dran pa nyams pa med par gyur cig /
analyzed: dran pa nyams pa med par gyur cig /
translated: May they have unimpaired mindfulness.

original: rtogs pa nges par gyur cig /
analyzed: rtogs pa nges par gyur cig /
translated: May they have certain understanding.

original: blo tshad med par gyur cig /
analyzed: blo tshad med par gyur cig /
translated: May they have immeasurable intelligence.

original: lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las kyi yon tan gyi rgyan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
analyzed: lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las kyi yon tan gyi rgyan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
translated: May they be adorned with all the qualities of physical, verbal, and mental action.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can de dag thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can de dag thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
translated: By this root of virtue, may all those beings please all the buddhas.

original: mnyes par byas nas kyang thugs 'byung ba med par gyur cig /
analyzed: mnyes par byas nas kyang thugs 'byung ba med par gyur cig /
translated: Having pleased them, may they not be disheartened.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la mi phyed pa'i dad pa yang thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la mi phyed pa'i dad pa yang thob par gyur cig /
translated: May they attain unwavering faith in those blessed buddhas.

original: de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos bstan pa thos par gyur cig /
analyzed: de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos bstan pa thos par gyur cig /
translated: May they hear the Dharma taught by those tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly awakened buddhas.

original: thos nas kyang the tshom dang / yid gnyis med par gyur cig /
analyzed: thos nas kyang the tshom dang / yid gnyis med par gyur cig /
translated: Having heard it, may they be free from doubt and uncertainty.

original: yang dag par 'dzin cing nan tan gyis sgrub par gyur cig /
analyzed: yang dag par 'dzin cing nan tan gyis sgrub par gyur cig /
translated: May they uphold it and practice it diligently.

original: sems kyi dga' ba nyid kyang thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems kyi dga' ba nyid kyang thob par gyur cig /
translated: May they attain mental joy.

original: kha na ma tho ba med pa'i lus kyi las kyang yang dag par grub par gyur cig /
analyzed: kha na ma tho ba med pa'i lus kyi las kyang yang dag par grub par gyur cig /
translated: May they accomplish physical actions that are irreproachable.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po la bdag rab tu gzhog par gyur cig /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po la bdag rab tu gzhog par gyur cig /
translated: May they be established in the roots of great merit.

original: shin tu dbul ba dang rnam par bral bar gyur cig /🔽nor bdun thob pa yongs su @177a *//
analyzed: shin tu dbul ba dang rnam par bral bar gyur cig / nor bdun thob pa yongs su @177a *//
translated: May they be free from poverty.

original: rdzogs par gyur cig /
analyzed: rdzogs par gyur cig /
translated: May they attain the perfection of the seven riches.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su yang slob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su yang slob par gyur cig /
translated: May they follow the example of all the buddhas.

original: dge ba'i dbang po 'thob par bya ba'ang thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: dge ba'i dbang po 'thob par bya ba'ang thob par gyur cig /
translated: May they attain the faculties of virtue.

original: mos pa chen po'i mnyam pa nyid kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
analyzed: mos pa chen po'i mnyam pa nyid kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
translated: May they perfect the sameness of great aspiration.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi go yang rnyed par gyur cig /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi go yang rnyed par gyur cig /
translated: May they attain the state of omniscient wisdom.

original: 'gro ba thams cad du nyams pa med pa'i mig kyang bskyed par gyur cig /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad du nyams pa med pa'i mig kyang bskyed par gyur cig /
translated: May they generate the eye that is never lost in any world.

original: mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i lus yongs su rdzogs pa yang thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i lus yongs su rdzogs pa yang thob par gyur cig /
translated: May they attain a body adorned with the major marks of a superior being.

original: yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i tshig rnam par dag pa yang yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
analyzed: yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i tshig rnam par dag pa yang yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
translated: May they be completely adorned with the pure words of all good qualities.

original: dbang po bsdams shing stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i sems dge ba yang dag par grub par gyur cig /
analyzed: dbang po bsdams shing stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i sems dge ba yang dag par grub par gyur cig /
translated: May they have the ten powers and a virtuous mind that is well controlled.

original: gnas med par spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
analyzed: gnas med par spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
translated: May they be completely free of any basis for conduct.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad bde ba'i rim gro gang dang ldan pa'i bde ba'i rim gro de dag sems can thams cad kyis thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad bde ba'i rim gro gang dang ldan pa'i bde ba'i rim gro de dag sems can thams cad kyis thob par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings obtain the same kind of service and happiness that all the buddhas have.

original: sangs rgyas kyi gnas rab tu thob pas tshad med pa'i gnas su gyur cig /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi gnas rab tu thob pas tshad med pa'i gnas su gyur cig /
translated: May they attain the immeasurable state of the buddhas.

original: sems can de dag thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po sgrib pa'i las sna tshogs las byung ba /
analyzed: sems can de dag thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po sgrib pa'i las sna tshogs las byung ba /
translated: May all sentient beings be free from the various karmic obscurations that arise from the mass of suffering.

original: sgrib pa'i las de dag gis bsgribs pa /
analyzed: sgrib pa'i las de dag gis bsgribs pa /
translated: May they be free from the karmic obscurations.

original: sangs rgyas mi mthong ba dang / chos mi thos pa dang / dge 'dun mi shes pa'i sgrib pa'i las rnam @177b pa sna tshogs kyis bsags pa'i sdug bsngal gyi phung po de dag bdag gi lus 'dis sems can dmyal ba'i skye gnas dang / ngan song gi sa'i gnas de dang de dag nas blang bar bya'o; ;sems can de dag thams cad ni /🔽dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis de nas bton te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas mi mthong ba dang / chos mi thos pa dang / dge 'dun mi shes pa'i sgrib pa'i las rnam @177b pa sna tshogs kyis bsags pa'i sdug bsngal gyi phung po de dag bdag gi lus 'dis sems can dmyal ba'i skye gnas dang / ngan song gi sa'i gnas de dang de dag nas blang bar bya'o; ;sems can de dag thams cad ni / dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis de nas bton te /
translated: I will take upon myself all the various karmic actions that have been accumulated by beings, which are the causes of the mass of suffering, and which are the obscurations that prevent them from seeing the Buddha, hearing the Dharma, and knowing the Saṅgha.🔽I will take all those beings out of the hells and the other lower realms.

original: bdag gis de dag gi sdug bsngal dang nyon mongs pa de dag blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis de dag gi sdug bsngal dang nyon mongs pa de dag blang bar bya'o //
translated: I will take on myself all the suffering and afflictions of those beings.

original: spro bar bya'o //
analyzed: spro bar bya'o //
translated: I will be enthusiastic.

original: mi ldog par bya'o //
analyzed: mi ldog par bya'o //
translated: I will not turn back.

original: de las mi 'bros par bya'o //🔽mi skrag par bya'o //
analyzed: de las mi 'bros par bya'o // mi skrag par bya'o //
translated: I will not flee from them.🔽I will not be afraid.

original: mi 'jigs par bya'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs par bya'o //
translated: I will not be terrified.

original: phyir mi ldog par bya'o //🔽zhum pa med par bya'o //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog par bya'o // zhum pa med par bya'o //
translated: I will not turn back.🔽I will not be discouraged.

original: mi skyo bar bya'o //
analyzed: mi skyo bar bya'o //
translated: I will not be weary.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽bdag gis ni /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / bdag gis ni /
translated: And why is that?

original: sems can thams cad bsgral bar smon lam btab pas na /
analyzed: sems can thams cad bsgral bar smon lam btab pas na /
translated: Because I have made the aspiration to liberate all beings.

original: sems can thams cad kyi khur bkur dgos so //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi khur bkur dgos so //
translated: I must carry the burden of all sentient beings.🔽I must liberate all sentient beings.🔽I must deliver all sentient beings.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su dgrol bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su dgrol bar bya'o //
translated: I must deliver all sentient beings from the wilderness of birth, the wilderness of old age and sickness, the wilderness of death and transmigration, the wilderness of all afflictions, the wilderness of all inopportune rebirths,🔽the wilderness of all cyclic existence, the wilderness of all views, the wilderness of all the destruction of virtuous qualities, the wilderness of ignorance,

original: 'di ltar bdag gis sems can thams cad bsgral bar bya'o //🔽skye ba'i dgon pa dang / rga ba dang / na ba'i dgon pa dang / 'chi ba'i dgon pa dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba'i dgon pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dgon pa dang / mi khom pa thams cad kyi dgon pa dang /🔽'khor ba thams cad kyi dgon pa dang / lta ba thibs po thams cad kyi dgon pa dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad gtor ba'i dgon pa dang / mi shes pa las byung ba'i dgon pa dang / dgon pa de @178a *//
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis sems can thams cad bsgral bar bya'o // skye ba'i dgon pa dang / rga ba dang / na ba'i dgon pa dang / 'chi ba'i dgon pa dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba'i dgon pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dgon pa dang / mi khom pa thams cad kyi dgon pa dang / 'khor ba thams cad kyi dgon pa dang / lta ba thibs po thams cad kyi dgon pa dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad gtor ba'i dgon pa dang / mi shes pa las byung ba'i dgon pa dang / dgon pa de @178a *//
translated: and all those wildernesses. I must deliver those sentient beings who are bound by the net of craving, who are obscured by the obscurations of ignorance, who are attached to the craving for existence,

original: zhen pa'i mthar gyur pa /
analyzed: zhen pa'i mthar gyur pa /
translated: They are at the end of attachment.

original: sdug bsngal gyi shing thags kyis bskor ba /
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi shing thags kyis bskor ba /
translated: They are surrounded by the thicket of suffering.

original: bdud kyi las la brten pa /
analyzed: bdud kyi las la brten pa /
translated: They are based on the work of Māra.

original: mi mkhas pa /
analyzed: mi mkhas pa /
translated: They are unskilled.

original: bsod nams 'gags pa /
analyzed: bsod nams 'gags pa /
translated: They have stopped their merit.

original: the tshom du gyur pa /
analyzed: the tshom du gyur pa /
translated: They are full of doubt.

original: rtag tu yid gnyis dang ldan pa /
analyzed: rtag tu yid gnyis dang ldan pa /
translated: They always have two minds.

original: mi bde ba mthong ba /
analyzed: mi bde ba mthong ba /
translated: They see what is not happiness.

original: 'byung ba la mi mkhas pa /
analyzed: 'byung ba la mi mkhas pa /
translated: They are unskilled in the elements.🔽They are like leaves that are surrounded by a whirlwind and are blown around and wander. I will completely liberate all of them.’

original: tshub mas bskor ba'i lo ma lta bur 'khor zhing 'phyan pa de dag thams cad yongs su thar par bya'o; ;zhes de la byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen pos yongs su rgyas pa'i sems dang ldan pas sems can gyi khams 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba mthong
analyzed: tshub mas bskor ba'i lo ma lta bur 'khor zhing 'phyan pa de dag thams cad yongs su thar par bya'o; ;zhes de la byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen pos yongs su rgyas pa'i sems dang ldan pas sems can gyi khams 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba mthong
translated: “The bodhisattvas, with their minds filled with great compassion, see the realm of beings sinking in the mud of saṃsāra.

original: nas sems can de dag la snying brtse ba chen po skyes pa /
analyzed: nas sems can de dag la snying brtse ba chen po skyes pa /
translated: They feel great love for those beings.

original: phan cher gdags pa'i sems rab tu bskyed pa /
analyzed: phan cher gdags pa'i sems rab tu bskyed pa /
translated: They have the thought to give them great benefit.

original: sems can rnams kyi don chen po bya bar dga' ba /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi don chen po bya bar dga' ba /
translated: They delight in doing great benefit for beings.

original: sems can mang po rab tu dgrol par dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems can mang po rab tu dgrol par dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: They dedicate their roots of virtue to the liberation of many beings.

original: yongs su bsngo ba chen po la zhugs pa /
analyzed: yongs su bsngo ba chen po la zhugs pa /
translated: he was engaged in great dedication;

original: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yongs su bsngo ba la rab tu zhugs pa /
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yongs su bsngo ba la rab tu zhugs pa /
translated: he was engaged in the dedication of all the bodhisattvas of the past, present, and future;

original: bsngo ba chen po'i mdos sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba /
analyzed: bsngo ba chen po'i mdos sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba /
translated: he was dedicating all those roots of virtue to all beings with the Great Vehicle of the Mahāyāna;

original: sems can thams cad shin tu rnam @178b par dag par bya bar sems pa /
analyzed: sems can thams cad shin tu rnam @178b par dag par bya bar sems pa /
translated: he was thinking of purifying all beings;🔽he was dedicating all the roots of virtue of all beings to the ultimate omniscience;

original: sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba kun thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug par yongs su bsngo ba de sems 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur te; sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi rgyal srid la rab tu gzhag pa'i🔽phyir bdag spyod de /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba kun thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug par yongs su bsngo ba de sems 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur te; sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi rgyal srid la rab tu gzhag pa'i phyir bdag spyod de /
translated: he had such thoughts as these: “I am practicing in order to establish all beings in the sovereignty of unsurpassed wisdom.

original: bdag ni / bdag 'ba' zhig yongs su dgrol ba la mngon par zhugs pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: bdag ni / bdag 'ba' zhig yongs su dgrol ba la mngon par zhugs pa ma yin gyi /
translated: I am not engaged in liberation for myself alone.

original: bdag gis sems can 'di dag kun thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems rab tu snang bas 'khor ba'i dgon pa rgal dka' ba nas gdon par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis sems can 'di dag kun thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems rab tu snang bas 'khor ba'i dgon pa rgal dka' ba nas gdon par bya'o //
translated: I will lead all these beings out of the wilderness of cyclic existence, which is so difficult to cross, by the light of the mind of omniscience.

original: g-yang sa chen po nas blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: g-yang sa chen po nas blang bar bya'o //
translated: I will lift them out of the great abyss.

original: gnod pa thams cad yongs su dgrol bar bya'o //
analyzed: gnod pa thams cad yongs su dgrol bar bya'o //
translated: I will free them from all suffering.

original: 'khor ba'i rgyud las rab tu bsgral bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i rgyud las rab tu bsgral bar bya'o //
translated: I will deliver them from the continuity of cyclic existence.

original: bdag nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po blang par spro bar bya'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po blang par spro bar bya'o //
translated: I will take on the burden of the mass of suffering of all beings.

original: bdag gis sems can de dag thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po'i sa'i 'og nas drang par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis sems can de dag thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po'i sa'i 'og nas drang par bya'o //
translated: I will lead all those beings out from under the earth of the great suffering of cyclic existence.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mthar thug pa thams cad kyi ngan song kun gyi sdug bsngal thams cad blangs te nyams su myong bar bya ba la bdag gi spro bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mthar thug pa thams cad kyi ngan song kun gyi sdug bsngal thams cad blangs te nyams su myong bar bya ba la bdag gi spro bar bya'o //
translated: I will take on and experience all the sufferings of all the lower realms in all the world systems.

original: bdag gis sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba las mi spang bar sems can thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir bdag ngan song gcig na phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i bskal par gnas par spro bar bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba las mi spang bar sems can thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir bdag ngan song gcig na phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i bskal par gnas par spro bar bya'o //
translated: I should not abandon any sentient being from my wholesome actions. I should delight in remaining in the hells for the sake of liberating all sentient beings, even until the end of time.
